products.name: Black Rain Ordnance AR-15 Chamber Lock
products.description:
ITEM: BRO-LOCK
Made in the USA
Patent pending design
Constructed from aircraft grade anodized aluminum
High quality laser engraved branding

Weapon cannot be charged or fired while lock is in place
Prevents weapon disassembly

Tired of cable locks? So are we! Simply lock back the bolt on your weapon and insert our keyed BRO-LOCK into the ejection port of your firearm to render the weapon unusable AND visibly safe. Once the lock is engaged the rifle cannot be charged or fired and prevents weapon disassembly. Our high visibility red anodized finish lets you know that there is a lock in the weapon.

products.name: Jeb's High Voltage Waterfowl Ported Choke Tube for 12 ga Browning Invector .695
products.description: JEBS High-Voltage Choke Tubes are designed to easily and effectively handle steel lead bismuth or any other shot you wish to shoot. The patented design gives the shooter a more consistent shot pattern a more distinctive & shortened shot-stream and incredible knock-down power for those much needed "longer shots." Choke Tubes are offered in Ported as well as Non-Ported models.

products.name: Jeb's Head Hunter Turkey Ported Choke Tube for 20 ga Remington .560
products.description: The Headhunter Turkey Choke was designed for both the seasoned-veteran and novice alike. Delivering extreme patterns down range at further distances it's the perfect choke for increased success in the turkey woods. Developed with JEBS patented "multi-staged" interior bore designs this choke tube allows for better "shot & wad cup" separation thus making patterns more precise and dense on the intended target.

products.name: Juggernaut Tactical Hellfighter AR Mod Kit Black CA Compliant
products.description: The Hellfighter Mod Kit it the perfect ultra-fast California Compliant magazine lock solution for your AR-15. Juggernaut's modified quick-release take down pin acts as a button to separate the upper from the lower just enough to disengage semi-automatic operation and automatically disable the magazine lock. It allows you to keep all of your current features including a pistol grip a forward grip and adjustable butt stock.

products.name: Juggernaut Tactical California Compliant Hell Fighter AR-10 Mod Kit-Black
products.description:
Juggernaut Tactical is proud to introduce the Hellfighter Mod Kit the perfect ultra-fast California Compliant magazine lock solution for your AR-15. This comes after a year of engineering and countless attempts to make the best and simplest solution on the market. With this bolt-on solution (patent pending) you will be able to perform magazine changes faster than you ever thought possible.

One of the features that sets Juggernaut Tactical apart is our modified quick-release takedown pin which acts as a button to separate the upper from the lower just enough to disengage semi-automatic operation and automatically disable the magazine lock. Once your upper is separated and disengaged from semi-automatic operation your magazine release is now operable. A simple tap closes the upper and re-engages the spring-loaded takedown pin and will quickly get you back in the fight. AR-10 Kit will work with either back or bottom-fed detent.

Once your upper is separated and disengaged from semi-automatic operation your magazine release is now operable. A simple tap closes the upper and re-engages the spring-loaded takedown pin and will quickly get you back in the fight. The Hellfighter Mod Kit is compatible with any Mil-spec AR-15.

products.name: B&T Telescopic stock for MP5

B&T Stock Telescopic for MP5

The MP5 from Heckler & Koch is one of the most widely used submachineguns. B&T offers a selection of shoulder stocks for the MP5 the MP5SD and the MP5k in order to adapt the weapon to the needs of its operator.

The MP5 from Heckler & Koch is one of the most widely used submachineguns. B&T offers a selection of shoulder stocks for the MP5 and the MP5SD in order to adapt the weapon to the needs of its operator.

Due to the in 5 positions length adjustable telescopic stock the MP5 offers very compact dimensions.The stock
can be extracted extremely fast and without pressing any levers. It is self locking.

***This is a great option to fit a telescopic stock on MP5 clones that do not fit the HK telescopic stock due to the stock binding in the channels on the side of the reciever.

NFA rules apply.

products.name: Kick's Gobblin Thunder Turkey Choke Tube for 12 ga Beretta Xtrema 1 & 2 .655
products.description:
All of Kick's chokes feature a conical parallel design. This refers to the cone of constriction (typical) coupled with a parallel section (rarely found in other chokes) of roughly 1" where the constriction is held constant. Kick's combines this design with their exclusive directional* diagonal ports that because of their outward angle create a sharp forward inside edge which grabs stabilizes and slows the wad for faster separation of wad and shot column. This results in cleaner patterns not adversely affected by the wad.

The diagonal ports also reduce muzzle jump and recoil for faster more accurate follow up shots. The external ported portion of the chokes extends roughly 1 3/4" from the muzzle and isn't noticable when shooting.

*Directional- The angle of the ports is 135 degree away from the shooter reducing side blast prevalent in ports 90 degree or less. This is a big plus for close quarters like duck blinds trap fields and five stand. The ports also stay clear and don't foul up like others.

The Gobblin' Thunder is a two-time winner of the NWTF still target shoot in Atlanta GA. The Gobblin' Thunder is also a two-time winner of the NWTF Ladies Open Competition and the Ô98 winner of the Jakes competition.Kick's has also captured many grand slam hunts. Gobblin' Thunder easily converts most 10 & 12 gauge factory-threaded barrels from a mild-mannered bird gun into a turkey hunting specialist.

products.name: Lee Breech Spline Drive Breech Lock Bushing with Die Lock Ring Eliminator 2/ct
products.description: Lee Spline drive Breech Lock Bushings 2 pack. New easy grip splined drive surface allows easy accurate and fast die installation in your press. products.name: Lee Load-All II Conversion Kit
products.description:
The Lee Load-All II Conversion Kit is designed specifically for 12 16 and 20 gauge reloading. This is a cost-efficient shotshell press that offers a number of beneficial features. The primary benefit of this kit is that it can convert to another gauge quickly and easily.

Everything needed to replace an entire die carrier is provided with this conversion kit which eliminates the need to make adjustments. The kit includes a steel sizer die carrier shellholder wad guide instructions and load data that make this extremely easy to learn to use.

products.name: Lee Decapper & Base .30 Caliber
products.description:
The Lee Decapper and Base is the perfect tool for quickly and efficiently removing military crimp. This decapper and base works by driving the primer out of the case with a hammer. Not only is this system fast and efficient but because it is made from steel you are guaranteed year after year of durable performance.

If you are looking for an efficient tool to remove military crimp look no further than the Lee Decapper and Base. This system comes in a variety of sizes to accommodate all of the most popular calibers so you can choose the one that is right for you.

products.description:
The Lee Decapper and Base is the perfect tool for quickly and efficiently removing military crimp. This decapper and base works by driving the primer out of the case with a hammer. Not only is this system fast and efficient but because it is made from steel you are guaranteed year after year of durable performance.

If you are looking for an efficient tool to remove military crimp look no further than the Lee Decapper and Base. This system comes in a variety of sizes to accommodate all of the most popular calibers so you can choose the one that is right for you.

products.name: Lee Hex Ratchets - 3/ct
products.description: Something as simple as Lee Hex Ratchets - 3/ct can make a huge difference for someone who enjoys home reloading. These affordable ratchets are handy to have around in case something should break or get lost. For a few dollars reloaders can be prepared and won

products.name: Lee Long Charging Die
products.description:
Lee Long Charging Die is for use with the Auto-Disk Pro Auto-Disk and Auto-Drum Powder Measure. ? Works with cases 1.760 to 2.620 inches long.

Works the same as the pistol powder through expanding die except it doesn`t expand the case mouth. Rifle case expansion is done in the sizing die.

For cases .860 to 1.760 inches long use the short charging die.

The shell holder set is constructed from hardened steel ensuring years of solid service. Includes shellholders: #1 #2 #3 #4 #5 #7 #8 #9 #10 #11 and #19. Some of the calibers this set fits include .22 Benchrest .243 Winchester 6mm Remington .25-284 7x7mm Japanese 8x57mm Mauser .35 Remington and others. products.name: Lee APP Swage Kit for Lee APP Press Only
products.description:
• Spring assisted case extraction with integrated case guide.
  • Removes the military crimp from the primer pocket while swaging the primer pocket of your brass.
  • Leaves a nice smooth entry radius for new primer.
  • Easy to adjust
  • No shell holder required
  • Only adjustment necessary is to change primer size.
  • Includes swage push die swage holder push rod small swage punch and large punch and shell holder adapter.
  • This product is for use in the Lee App press only.

products.name: Lee Steel Block for Lee Bench Plate System
products.description: The Lee Steel Bench Block is designed to work in conjunction with the Patented Lee Bench Plate system featured on the the quick change Lee Bench Plate and Lee Reloading Stand. Constructed of thick steel with a durable black powder-coated finish. Integral tabs on plate ensure positive location and proper plate retention. Steel Bench Block comes complete with mounting holes for all current Lee Presses. Hardware for mounting one reloading press is included.

products.name: Lee 4 Hole Turret
products.description: The Lee Aluminum 4-hole Turret for quick caliber change for the 4-Hole Turret Press and Classic Turret Press. This 4 hole turret will not fit inside the Pro 1000 or 3 Hole Turret Press.

products.name: Lee Multi-Tube Adapter for Bullet Feed Kit
products.description:
The Lee Multi-Tube Adapter for Bullet Feed Kit is made for this feed kit which is sold separately producing a continuous supply of bullets for reloading. The adapter comes in both small and large sizes but if purchased with the kit a cylinder small and large feed tubes and plate assembly are also included.

The bullet feed kit for this adapter is made is made for the Load Master and Pro 1000 both Lee products. With this product bullets are fed automatically into the seating die. As a result bullets are aligned more accurately than trying to load by hand.

products.name: Lee Decapping Die
products.description: An absolute must for those who clean cases before reloading. Cases need not be clean nor lubed when using this die. Cases are not sized at all only deprimed. Works on boxer-primed brass only. Fits cases up to .560" in diameter and up to 3.125" long.

products.name: Lee Undersize Mandrel .3055
Lee Bulge Buster Kit
products.description:
The Lee Bulge Buster Kit is a must-have for the serious reloader in order to ensure that your handgun brass is completely bulge-free. The Lee Bulge Buster Kit features a push-through die adapter which quickly removes the bulge rings that a standard die cannot reach due to shellholder constraints.

Included in the Lee Bulge Buster Kit is the extension sleeve the push-through punch and the catch container. With this kit in hand you can process your handgun cases quickly and easily. With the addition of the Lee Factory Crimp Die you can repair rimless cases as well.

The Lee Bulge Buster Base Sizing Kit is the perfect accessory to make reloaded ammunition more reliable. This kit installs quickly easily and is a breeze to operate. After installed in a Lee Carbide Factory Crimp Die (Not Included) all the reloader does is push through a pistol cases that exhibits a low base bulge. The carbide sizing ring from the factory crimp die removes the bulge producing more reliable ammunition.

  • Fits: Lee Factory Crimp Dies (380 ACP 40 S&W 10mm Auto 41 AE 45 GAP 45 ACP 45 Win Mag
  • Function: Removes the lower base bulge that can be found on some cases fired through today's popular auto-loading pistols
  • Material: Steel
  • Notes: Will not work with 9mm Luger

products.name: Lee Turret Undersize Mandrel .273
products.description: When delivered from the factory the collet die will grip the bullet with a light press fit with cases of average hardness. Should you desire a tighter fit you can order this .002 undersize mandrel for 270 Winchester.

products.name: Lee 3 Hole Turret
products.description:
The Lee 3 Hole Turret is manufactured by a company with years of experience in the reloading business. This turret is designed to last for multiple sessions offering a compact size that makes its use much easier. When changing calibers this turret helps keep everything properly adjusted.

With a unique spring-free design this three-hole turret is ideal for reloading various pistol and rifle calibers. The solid steel ring and bolt type lugs ensure the turret stays securely locked into place. Using this product makes it possible to change calibers without having to readjust your dies.

products.name: Lee 1 1/4-12 Breech Lock Update Kit
products.description:
Lee 1 1/4"-12 Breech Lock Update Kit. Convert your green or red press to allow use of Lee's Breech Lock quick-change bushing feature.

Kit includes :

  • 1 1/4"-12 breech lock adapter
  • Spline drive lock-ring eliminator
  • Lock-ring wrench

Compatible with the following presses :

  • Lee Precision Classic Cast
  • Hornady Iron
  • Hornady Classic / Lock-N-Load
  • RCBS Rock Chucker Supreme
  • Redding Big Boss
  • Redding 700 Ultramag

products.name: Lee Die Lock Rings - 3/ct
products.description: Lee Billet Aluminum Lock Rings are easy to adjust just finger tighten holds the adjustment rock solid. Package of 3 These rings have the standard 7/8-14 thread and they can be finger-tightened so you do not need to buy any extra tools in order to use them.

products.name: Lee Red 3-Die Round Storage Box
products.description:
The Lee Red 3-Die Round Storage Box is the perfect solution for keeping your extra dies safe when you are not using them. Made from durable red plastic this round storage box ensures dust-free protection and is great for both long-term and short-term storage.

If you are a serious reloader who often switches between different dies you need a reliable way to store your extra dies

products.name: Lee Ultimate Lock Rings 3/pk
products.description:
Lee started with custom extrusion of high strength aluminum with a splined exterior surface. They split the ring and added a cross bolt that when even lightly tightened applies a vice like grip on your dies. No tiny set screws that easily strip or damage your die threads.

Then added the famous Lee “O” ring because no matter how securely you have the lock ring clamped to the die it will loosen in the press during operation without the friction of the “O” ring. The “O” ring allows you to finger tighten into your press and it will never loosen during operation yet you can easily remove your die with finger pressure.

Also included is a handy slim profile lock ring wrench works great when fitting dies on a turret or tool head. Dies are simply easier to install with the lock ring wrench.

  • Compatible with 7/8 x 14 threaded Lee reloading dies and Lee reloading presses
  • Torque type splined exterior for a no-slip grip
  • "O" ring anti-rotation included. Never loosens during use
  • Lock-ring wrench included

products.name: Lee Pro 1000 Case Feeder Tubes
products.description:
When it comes to reloading there are a number of products that can make the process easier faster and more accurate including Lee Pro 1000 Case Feeder Tubes. Many people choose to keep an extra on hand in case a tube breaks.

These feeder tubes are made in the United States by a company with solid experience in the business of reloading. The tubes are made from strong and durable plastic and made for the Load Master or Pro 1000 press. These tubes come in a package of seven making them extremely economical.

products.name: Lee Pro 1000 and Load-Master Complete Bullet Feed Kit - 9mm/.60" to .75" Long
products.description:
For people who enjoy reloading the Lee Pro 1000 and Load-Master Complete Bullet Feed Kit is an excellent and trusted choice. With this feed kit bullets can be fed automatically into the seating die mouth. A huge advantage of this feed kit is that bullets are aligned more accurately compared to loading by hand.

The kit is designed specifically for the Load Master and Pro 1000 press and increases the cyclic rate anywhere from 50 percent to 100 percent. This feed kit is made by a company with years of experience in the reloading business and manufactured in the USA.

products.name: Lee App Bulge Buster Kit
products.description:
The Lee App Bulge Buster Kit and the appropriate Lee Carbide Factory Crimp Die restore free function of rimless cases that have low base bulges. Low base bulges usually occur from chambers that do not fully support the cartridge or cases resized in carbide dies from manufacturers other than Lee. These show a noticeable stop ring near the base. You will most likely find cases with these problems in mixed range brass. 

The Lee Carbide Factory Crimp Die must be purchased separately.

products.name: Lee Factory Crimp Die LTD Production .277 Sig Fury
products.description: Lee 277 Sig Fury Factory Crimp Die crimps the bullet in place more firmly than any other tool. Tests demonstrate that even bullets which have no crimp groove will shoot more accurately. A firm crimp improves accuracy because pressure must build to a higher level before the bullet begins to move. This higher start pressure insures a more uniform pressure curve and less velocity variation.

This shell holder is perfect for a wide range of calibers including .45 ACP 7mm/08 8x57 Mauser and the .25-06.

This shell holder is constructed from hardened steel. Like all Lee products it is carefully engineered and required to pass strict quality control processes. Because of high-quality materials and workmanship this has become a trusted reloading part.

products.name: Lee Inline Bullet Feed Kit .35 cal
products.description:
Inline Bullet Feed Kit 35CAL. For use with 380 Auto 9mm Luger to 357 Mag bullet diameter range .312 to .360. Includes Feed Die and bullet feed magazine.

All steel construction featuring a ball bearing escapement mechanism. Spring loaded positive ball carrier return assures reliable operation. Jacketed cast powder coated and copper plated bullets are reliably fed. Configurable for long and short bullet lengths. Includes support tab for the optional multi tube feed magazine. Works in any press with standard 7/8-14 threads. 

Each die is caliber specific so there is nothing to change or adjust.  Easy adjustment place a case in your press and screw the Inline die in until it drops a bullet plus a half a turn and that’s it.

Extra gatling style magazines works great to have another magazine ready to load.

products.name: Lee Inline Bullet Sizer Magazine Filler Kit For Breech Lock Reloader Press .220" -.463"
products.description:
This kit contains everything you need to use the Bullet sizer and punch with the Lee Inline Bullet Feed Magazine. Now you can size bullets and simultaneously fill the Lee Gatling style bullet feeder. The system works so well once your bullet is sized you will never touch it again. Simply transfer your filled magazine to your press and start loading.

Kit includes small medium and large magazines with matching drop tubes and supports. Breech Lock bullet sizer and special adapter.

Works with .220 to .463 diameter bullets.

Press shown sold separately.

products.description: Includes round retainer nut set screw mag spacer and fender washer for inverting the fill tubes on the Inline Bullet Sizer Magazine Filler Kit. Press shown for reference and is not included.

products.name: Lee Inline Single Bullet Feed Tube
products.description:
Inline single bullet feed tube includes single tube adapter for the Lee Inline Feed Die and 5 feed tubes. Works with .220 to .463 diameter bullets.

Picture shows the Inline single bullet feed tube installed into the Inline feed die and Lee Six Pack Pro Reloading Press.

products.name: Lee Inline Bullet Feed Kit .24 cal
products.description:
Inline Bullet Feed Kit 24 CAL. Works with 6mm and 243 Winchester bullet diameter .238 to .245. Includes Feed Die and bullet feed magazine.

All steel construction featuring a ball bearing escapement mechanism. Spring loaded positive ball carrier return assures reliable operation. Jacketed cast powder coated and copper plated bullets are reliably fed. Configurable for long and short bullet lengths. Includes support tab for the optional multi tube feed magazine. Works in any press with standard 7/8-14 threads. 

Each die is caliber specific so there is nothing to change or adjust.  Easy adjustment place a case in your press and screw the Inline die in until it drops a bullet plus a half a turn and that’s it.

Extra gatling style magazines works great to have another magazine ready to load.

products.name: LEE Roller Handle Upgrade for Six Pack/Classic Series Presses
products.description:
The Lee Press Roller Handle is ergonomically correct for long reloading sessions and has a compound bend which eliminates the need to slouch on the down stroke. What sets our Big Press Roller Handle apart from others is their high strength tubular steel handle is balanced reducing the likelihood of any pinched fingers.

Note:  Classic Turret and Classic Cast presses purchased prior to year 2023 will need updated 10 degree lever clamp and a 10 degree lever sleeve.

Upgrade your Six Pack Pro Classic Turret Press or Classic Cast ball grip to an ergonomic hardwood roller handle grip.

products.name: Lee Universal 5-Tube Case Feed Magazine
products.description: 5 case feed tubes automate the case feeding operation on the APP Deluxe APP Pro 1000 Pro 4000 Kit | Auto Breech Lock Pro Load-Master and Six Pack Pro presses. Increases rates and has been optimized for bottleneck cartridges.

products.name: Lee ACP Primer Feed Upgrade Kit
products.description: Upgrade your ACP Primer Feed to the 2023+ Deluxe APP Primer Feed. Kit includes rail assembly primer trough hardware and roller handle upgrade kit.

products.name: Lee Spring Attach for Select Lee Presses
products.description: Spring attach for 1982 to 2022 Pro 1000 Auto Breech Lock Pro and Pro 4000 Kit.

products.name: Lee Universal 5 Tube Case Collator
products.description:
Lee Universal Case Collator fits on top of the Universal 5 tube case feed magazine makes filling the tubes faster on the APP Pro 1000 Pro 4000 Load-Master and Six Pack Pro presses. Case feed tubes sold separately.

  • Case diverter prevents inverted cases and promotes quicker filling.
  • Hole mask allows proper head down orientation of smallest pistol cases.
  • Works reliably for the 223 Remington.
  • Agitation ribs promote expedited tube filling.
  • Nearly 40 percent greater capacity over our original case collator.

products.name: Lee Carbide Factory Crimp Micrometer Seater Adapter 30 Super Carry/32 ACP
products.description:
Transform your Lee Carbide Factory Crimp die into the most accurate and easiest to adjust bullet seating die ever made. Simply remove the stock adjusting screw and replace with cartridge specific adapter.

You have all these great benefits:

  • Uniform dead length bullet seating
  • Easy crimp adjustment die is never moved after installation
  • Bullet seating depth is micrometer accurate
  • Cartridge is post-sized after seating and crimping
  • Saves an extra step.

Perfect for progressive or turret press users with limited stations. Crimping seating and post sizing in one step.

products.name: Lee Power Grip Shell Holder
products.description:
Provides a comfortable grip for holding cases during case trimming and chamfering sessions. Installs into all popular priming tools that accept priming tool shell holders including our Lee Auto Prime and Auto Bench Prime and others: K&M Sinclair FA Platinum or Perfect Seat CPS or 21st Century.

This adapter holds your brass while trimming to the appropriate length or chamfering the inside and outside of the case neck. Allows you to rapidly change between pieces of brass without having to loosen up a knurled shell holder every time.

products.name: Lee Handgun Micrometer Adjust Screw
products.description:
The micrometer adjust screw by Lee Precision replaces the original adjusting screw on any Lee bullet seating die. Infinitely adjustable allows precision bullet seating depth.

Easy to read laser engraved divisions represent .001" one thousandth of an inch. The integrated friction ring eliminates annoying clicks that prevent splitting thousandths. No clicks just smooth adjustment. Reads just like a precision depth micrometer record your setting and easily return to them for future use.

The micrometer adjuster can be easily transferred to other Lee Bullet Seating Dies but it is so economically priced you will want one for every die.

products.name: TacStar Shotgun Rail Mount - Short
products.description:
TacStar Shotgun Rail Mount includes three Picatinny rails of the standard size each of which is located 90 degrees from the next. This design gives the rail mount the ability to be configured in various arrangements to meet any needs for mounting accessories to your shotgun.

The clamping system of the mount is easy to install and manages to offer strength and security without marring the extensions. You can select either a short (1.8-inch) or long (4.1-inch) shotgun mount. When selecting the ideal mount length consider your accessories as well as extension length.

products.name: TacStar 4-Shot SideSaddle Shotshell Carrier for 12 ga Rem 870
products.description:
TacStar’s 4 round SideSaddle Shotshell Carrier is the perfect accessory for all your hunting shotguns. The 4 round SideSaddle mounts easily to the side of the receiver and requires no modifications to the shotgun. Each SideSaddle is designed to provide clearance for long forends such as the new Benelli Nova model and come with all mounting hardware. SideSaddles keep extra shells securely in place and in the perfect location for reloading. No more digging in your pockets for extra shotgun shells. The 4 round SideSaddle Shotshell Carrier is an easy set-up that provides convenient reloads. Order TacStar today!

Features:

  • Unbreakable Corrosion Resistant Polymer Shellholder
  • Rugged Aluminum Backing Plate
  • Easy Mounting No Gunsmith Design
  • Fits Rem 870 1100 11 87

products.name: Tacstar Slimline Sidesaddle Shotshell Holder for Mossberg 500/590
products.description:
Tacstar's SideSaddle line has gained a large following because of their convenient placement of shells right where you need them for a fast reload. Tacstar has taken the SideSaddle to the next level with their streamlined version that features easy shell removal with secure shell retention. They use a non-glare; anodized aluminum backing plate material and they have contoured the plate so that it takes up less space on the receiver and has fewer areas that could potentially snag. Additionally Tacstar uses a rigid weather resistant polymer material for the shell carrier that is equipped with an internal flexible retention strip positioned along the shells to give them a secure hold yet allows easy removal. Like the backing plate the shell carrier also is smaller in size than our traditional SideSaddle adding to its sleek appearance.

Features:

  • Sleek streamlined appearance
  • Strong rigid non-glare anodized aluminum backing plate
  • Rugged polymer shell carrier with flexible retention strip
  • Reduced size and streamlined shape reduce chances of snagging
  • Available for Remington 870/1100/11-87 and Mossberg 500/590

products.name: Wilson Expanding Mandrel Only .22 Cal .223"
products.description:
The Wilson Expanding Mandrel Sizing Die. This die is designed to be used on NEW brass cases to prepare the case for the seating operation. Over the past few years we have seen a greater need to run new brass cases over and expanding mandrel to properly prepare them for their first firing. New brass cases are often damaged when shipped in bulk this die will give you a consistent neck diameter on your cases. With correct neck tension you can expect a more consistent seating depth and shot.

Includes one mandrel. Additional mandrels sold separately.

Features:

  • Cut out in die provides an easy view for making sure case aligns and setting up depth
  • Interchangeable Mandrels depending on caliber
  • Standard 7/8ths Reloading Press
  • Die ONLY expands neck to slightly under bullet diameter 
  • Stainless Parts for a Long Lasting Finish
  • Durable and Accurate
  • L.E. Wilson manufactured lock nut - thickness is .225" from inside to outermost edge .270" for height and 1.250" total width OD

This die is designed to be used on NEW brass cases to prepare the case for the seating operation. Over the past few years we have seen a greater need to run new brass cases over and expanding mandrel to properly prepare them for their first firing. New brass cases are often damaged when shipped in bulk this die will give you a consistent neck diameter on your cases. With correct neck tension you can expect a more consistent seating depth and shot.

Includes one mandrel. Additional mandrels sold separately.

Features:

  • Cut out in die provides an easy view for making sure case aligns and setting up depth
  • Interchangeable Mandrels depending on caliber
  • Standard 7/8ths Reloading Press
  • Die ONLY expands neck to slightly under bullet diameter 
  • Stainless Parts for a Long Lasting Finish
  • Durable and Accurate
  • L.E. Wilson manufactured lock nut - thickness is .225" from inside to outermost edge .270" for height and 1.250" total width OD

products.name: Wilson Inside Neck Reamer 6.5mm
products.description:
Wilson Case Mouth Inside Neck Reamer. Use on thick case necks after multiple sizing and firings. Material build up in case necks can cause high chamber pressures and erratic shooting. Stock sizes are larger than bullet diameter and are to be used on AS-FIRED brass.

Features:

  • Reamers can be used when Forming Wildcats from a Parent case.
  • Standard reamers are sized for use on fired un-sized cases
  • Special sizes can be ground but will extend lead time please call for pricing and availability
  • Price includes one Knob Style Handle and one Inside Neck Reamer.
  • Made in the U.S.A.

products.name: Wilson Stainless Steel Micro-Adjustable Bullet Seater Cap for Standard Inline Seater Die
products.description:
Turn any of L.E. Wilson's precision Chamber Type Seaters into a micrometer adjustable die. Just remove the standard Bullet Seater cap and thread your Micrometer

  • 303/416 Stainless material
  • Precision cut 40 TPI for a fine adjustment of bullet seating depth
  • Adjust in .001 increments with .025 per full rotation - easier to dial in seating depth
  • Accepts all calibers of Seating stems (Drifts) 17 to 35 cal
  • Turn any of our precision Chamber Type Seaters into a micrometer adjustable die. Just remove the standard Bullet Seater cap and thread your Micrometer cap on adjust set screw and that's it.
  • Compact design - about the same height as our standard cap that is supplied with the die
  • Laser etched lettering and scale
  • MADE IN THE USA!

products.name: Wilson Stainless Steel Micro-Adjustable Bullet Seater Cap for Standard Inline Seater Die

products.name: Wilson Die Kit Storage Box - Case Only
products.description: Keep your dies separated and organized with this replacement die storage box from L.E. Wilson. This die box will hold 2 reloading dies and a L.E. Wilson case gauge.

products.name: Lyman Decapping Die - Universal
products.description:
The Lyman Universal Decapping Die is the perfect die for decapping your primer pockets before you clean your cases. This handy tool features a one-piece design made from hardened steel to ensure a lifetime of durable performance. What more could you ask for?

This Lyman Universal Decapping Die is ideal for removing military crimp from your primer pockets and works on all types of calibers ranging from .22 through .45 except for the .378 and the .460 Weatherby. If you are in the market for a high-quality decapping die look no further.

products.name: Lyman Split-Loc Die Locking Ring - 7/8"-14 Thread
products.description:
The Lyman Split-Lock Die Locking Ring has been newly redesigned to be a step up from standard die locking rings. What makes this split-lock die locking ring different? It eliminates any possibility that the set screw will touch the die threads in any way.

Why is it important to keep the set screw from touching the die threads? Because it eliminates the possibility of damage done to the threads. This feature sets the Lyman Split-Lock Die Locking Ring apart from other 7/8-inch-14 thread rings and it is threaded perfectly for use with standard reloading dies.

products.name: Lyman Stuck Case Remover Kit
products.description:
The Lyman Stuck Case Remover Kit will safely and easily remove stuck cases from sizing dies. Unlike other kits all the tools that are needed are included. The kit includes a unique dual purpose threaded cap that screws over the end of the die. This cap acts as both a drill guide and a guide for the pulling screw. An extra-long hex wrench is included which provides plenty of leverage when removing stuck cases and also doubles as a handle for the tap wrench.

  • Kit includes threaded cap tap drill 1/4-20 tap hex screw long hex wrench and tap wrench.
  • Everything needed is included in the kit
  • Unique dual purpose threaded cap
  • Long hex wrench provides plenty of leverage and doubles as a tap wrench handle
  • Packed in an easy-to-display clam shell with full instructions

products.name: Lyman Universal Spring Loaded Decapping Die
products.description: Lyman’s Universal Spring Loaded Decap Die is equipped with a spring-loaded decapping rod system that ensures the primer is forcefully ejected from the primer pocket every time. This die works great for processing brass on automated and progressive presses as well as for prepping brass for cleaning on standard turret and single station presses. Works on all calibers 22 through 45 except for 378 and 460 Weatherby. (Will not remove Berdan primers.)

products.name: Lyman Pro Dies Stainless Steel Universal Hold-Down Die
products.description:
The Universal Hold-Down Die is designed for use on Mark 7 and other progressive presses with swage primer pockets. The die is equipped with a sturdy rod which is designed to reach down inside the case and hold the case firmly in position as the swaging operation takes place. This prevents cases from being torn out of the shell plate damaging it and the brass. Two rods are included to cover the full range of rifle and pistol cases.

The die body is also made of corrosion resistant stainless steel which protects it from rust and keeps it looking like new for a lifetime of use.

products.name: Lyman Shell Holder Set
products.description:
This Lyman Shell Holder Set is made from durable steel affordably priced and designed to provide years of reloading service. This set includes 12 of the most popular shell holders in a convenient storage box. Because of the different sizes the shell holders in this set fit over 75 different caliber cartridges.

Some of the calibers this set works with include the .30-06 Springfield .30-30 WCF .38 Special .357 Magnum .44 Remington Magnum .45 Long Colt .44 Special 7mm Remington Magnum .45-70 Government .40 Smith & Wesson 10mm and more. Dies are not included with this set.

products.name: Lyman Shell Holder Set
products.description:
This Lyman Shell Holder Set is made from durable steel affordably priced and designed to provide years of reloading service. This set includes 12 of the most popular shell holders in a convenient storage box. Because of the different sizes the shell holders in this set fit over 75 different caliber cartridges.

Some of the calibers this set works with include the .30-06 Springfield .30-30 WCF .38 Special .357 Magnum .44 Remington Magnum .45 Long Colt .44 Special 7mm Remington Magnum .45-70 Government .40 Smith & Wesson 10mm and more. Dies are not included with this set.

products.name: Lyman T-Mag II Extra Turret
products.description:
For greater stability the Lyman T-Mag II Extra Turret is ideal for people who prefer reloading. The turret base has been flat machined to ensure solid mounting on a bench. In addition the turret has non-rust links and handles is perfect for pistol cartridges and can be changed out quickly and easily.

With this turret calibers are switched in matter of seconds. The turret offers six spaces for holding threaded dies of 7/8-inch-14 making it possible to mount six different dies at the same time. In addition to the T-Mag 2 this turret fits the T-Mag press.

products.name: Lyman Brass-Smith All-American 8 Press Extra Turret
products.description: For the eight station Brass Smith All-American 8 Turret Press. Shoulder bolt not included.

products.name: Lyman Primer Catcher
products.description:
The Lyman Primer Catcher is a replacement part used by people who enjoy reloading. With this the Crusher 2 T-Mag or T-Mag 2 press will operate as if brand new. This primer catcher is made from durable plastic is extremely affordable and goes through strict engineering processes and quality-control checks.

The catcher is made to lock securely to the press but when time to remove and empty it comes off quickly and easily. This particular catcher is made to fit the T-Mag Compound and Crusher II presses. As with all Lyman products it has an excellent company guarantee.

products.name: Lyman All-American Press Roller Handle
products.description:
Greater comfort equals greater production! Increase your reloading comfort and production with the addition of our Roller Press Handle. The handle features a smooth operating aluminum roller grip which keeps your hand in the same position throughout the press stroke greatly increasing operating comfort. The steel handle is shaped to fit closely to the press frame for improved ergonomics. The handle installs easily the same as the OEM handle. Available for the following presses: Lyman All-American 8 turret Lyman Victory RCBS Rockchucker and RCBS Rockchucker Supreme.

  • Increase comfort and production
  • Decrease fatigue
  • Smooth operating aluminum roller grip
  • Available for Lyman All-American 8 turret Lyman Victory RCBS Rockchucker and RCBS Rockchucker Supreme.

products.name: Lyman RCBS Rock Crusher Press Roller Handle
products.description:
Greater comfort equals greater production! Increase your reloading comfort and production with the addition of the Lyman RCBS Roller Press Handle. The handle features a smooth operating aluminum roller grip which keeps your hand in the same position throughout the press stroke greatly increasing operating comfort.

The steel handle is shaped to fit closely to the press frame for improved ergonomics. The handle installs easily the same as the OEM handle.

(Available for the following presses: Lyman All-American 8 turret Lyman Victory RCBS Rockchucker and RCBS Rockchucker Supreme)

  • Increase comfort and production
  • Decrease fatigue
  • Smooth operating aluminum roller grip
  • Fits RCBS Rockchucker

products.name: Lyman Lyman Turret Stand for All American 8 T-Mag Redding T-7
products.description:
Lyman's Turret Stand keeps your loading bench neat and organized. The sturdy stand will hold up to 3 turrets filled with dies making it easy to swap calibers. The stand has a wide base for stability and uses nylon sleeves to separate the turrets on the steel center post. The stand will work with Lyman All-American 8 plus Lyman T-Mag and T-Mag II turrets. It will also work with Redding T-7 turrets. 

  • Works with Lyman All-American 8 Lyman T-Mag and T-Mag II turrets as well as Redding T-7 
  • Holds up to 3 turrets with dies 
  • Wide stable base 
  • Metal construction

products.name: Lyman Lyman Turret Stand for All American 8 T-Mag Redding T-7
products.description:

products.name: Lyman Priming Arm Universal
products.description:
The Lyman Priming Arm Universal is an affordable replacement part that many seasoned reloaders like to have on hand. This priming arm is designed to work with the Crusher Crusher 2 T-Mag and T-Mag 2 press. Made from aluminum and steel the arm is strong and durable.

This arm installs on the mentioned presses and with a spring-loaded design stays out of the ram slot until in position. Included with the arm are two priming sleeves one for small primers and the other for large primers. Because of excellent workmanship Layman has become a trusted brand among serious reloaders.

products.name: Lyman Shell Holder - #1 Size
products.description:
The Lyman Shell Holder is available for various calibers; its steel construction provides a perfect fit for reloading. This shell holder is made to work with virtually any Lyman press although it also works with most other top-rated brands as well.

Some of the calibers this shell holder fits include the 7.62x54 Russian .416 Rigby .45-90 Sharps .45-70 Government .40-65 Sharps .45-110 Sharps .45-100 WCF and .45-120 Sharps. Lyman takes great pride in every product manufactured and offers precision engineering and strict quality-control checks that ensure customer satisfaction.

products.name: Lyman Shell Holder - #12 Size
products.description:
The Lyman Shell Holder is available for various calibers; its steel construction provides a perfect fit for reloading. This shell holder is made to work with virtually any Lyman press although it also works with most other top-rated brands as well.

Some of the calibers this shell holder fits include the 7.62x54 Russian .416 Rigby .45-90 Sharps .45-70 Government .40-65 Sharps .45-110 Sharps .45-100 WCF and .45-120 Sharps. Lyman takes great pride in every product manufactured and offers precision engineering and strict quality-control checks that ensure customer satisfaction.

products.name: Lyman Multi-Expand Charge Die System
products.description:
The Lyman Multi-Expand Charge Die System is made from strong and durable steel. Considering the high-quality materials and workmanship this is an affordable product. Because of the hollow expander design reloaders have the ability to expand a case and drop powder simultaneously while keeping the powder measure mounted to the top.

This die system is made to fit all of the standard powder measures; the shell holder is sold separately. Included with the system is an expander body nonexpanding universal powder drop tube and hollow expanders for 9mm 10mm/.40 S&W .38/.357 .41 .44 and .45.

products.name: Lyman Brass-Smith Bushing for Case Trim Xpress #1 .17 Hornet .22 Hornet
products.description: The Lyman Brass Smith Bushings for Case Trim Xpress ( Items LY7862015 & LY7862016) are designed to fit most popular bottleneck rifle cases. The bushings support and center the case with the cutter. No pilots are needed. The bushings are spring loaded to provide a smooth effortless cut; and allow the user to trim approximately 15 cases per minute.

products.name: Lyman Decapping Pins - 10/ct
products.description:
Lyman Decapping Pins come in a convenient 10-piece box to ensure that you always have them on hand when you need them. These pins are the perfect solution for replacing worn or broken decapping pins and they work with Lyman decapping pins of any age.

Not only are these Lyman Decapping Pins versatile enough to be used with all of Lyman

products.name: Lyman 1-Piece Pistol Decapping Rod
products.description:
• Super hard and slick carbide expander button
  • Fits all Lyman pistol sizing dies
  • Carbide button can be adjusted for height
  • Carbide free floats on the rod for self-centering in case necks

products.name: MEC Powder Bushing #8 Size
products.description:
Made from aluminum the MEC Powder Bushing is a nice reloading replacement part to have on hand especially for reloaders who run high-volume sessions. This bushing works with progressive and single-stage charge bars is competitively priced and comes in a wide range of sizes for different loads as well as most powders.

MEC strives to surpass not only company but also customer standards. Even in a small powder bushing there is precision engineering and strict quality-control checks. Because MEC goes out of its way to please the company has become popular around the world.

products.name: MEC Bushing Rack
products.description: Stylish and convenient bushing rack with MEC lasered logo. Holds up to 10 bushings. Bushing numbers are easily visible. Can be mounted to bench wall or free-standing. Bushings NOT included.

products.name: MEC Press Tray Fits MEC Marksman Single Stage Reloader
products.description: Additional tray that mounts directly to the MEC Marksman Single Stage Reloader ( Item ME1311080). Store bullets cases or small items within easy reach with this convenient tray.

products.name: MEC Shell Holder Tray Fits MEC Marksman Single Stage Reloader
products.description: Convenient tray to hold shell holders that mounts directly to the MEC Marksman Single Stage Press ( Item ME1311080).

products.name: MEC Press Base Fits MEC Jig Fixture Mounting System
products.description: Additional base for easy installation and is compatible with the MEC Jig Fixture mounting system. The press base bolts to the press raising it up for better visibility and clearance. Base is also designed to hold reloading dies on the sides keeping your dies close at hand while reloading.

products.name: MEC EZ-Pak
products.description:
The MEC EZ-Pak makes stacking and boxing reloaded shells much easier. With this product shells are stacked in slid into the box and then pulled out with the EX-Pak. For people who enjoy home reloading this is a convenient accessory that makes the process of loading 25 rounds faster.

Although a simple design and concept MEC takes pride in the materials and construction. After all this product bears the MEC name. MEC products are precision engineered thoroughly inspected and backed with a solid guarantee.

products.name: MEC E-Z Primer V for 600 Jr & 700
products.description: Automatic primer feeds eliminate the time consuming bother of handling individual primers. For MEC Single Stage 600 700 and Mark V presses.

products.name: MEC E-Z Primer V for 600 Jr & 700
products.description: Automatic primer feeds eliminate the time consuming bother of handling individual primers. For MEC Single Stage 600 700 and Mark V presses.

products.name: MEC Bottle for MEC Shotshell Press - Small
products.description:
For the highest-quality shotshell presses that provide outstanding reloading session after session a high-volume reloader is required. For reloaders there is an array of different pieces of equipment tools and accessories that make loading fun fast efficient and safe. One of these is the MEC bottle which is always nice to have on hand.

In fact many reloaders will purchase two bottles keeping one filled with a different size shot or powder which helps make load changes go quicker. Of course the manufacturer reminds reloaders to always mark the contents of the bottle clearly to avoid unwanted accidents.

products.name: MEC Single Stage Lead Shot Charge Bar - 1 oz
products.description:
Although there are different charge bars manufactured by this company the MEC Single Stage Lead Shot Charge Bar is among the more popular. This quick change charge bar is constructed from anodized aluminum which guarantees it can withstand harsh conditions. This bar is made for removable powder charge bushings needed to adjust charges of powder with the bushings being sold separately.

Designed for MEC single-stage shotshell presses this bar includes a soft insert that prevents shearing hard shot or larger shot. Keep in mind that steel shot and lead shot charge bars are not intended to be interchanged.

products.name: MEC Single Stage Lead Shot Charge Bar - 11/16 oz
products.description: Bars bored for powder bushings are designated 502 series for progressive tools and 302 series for single-stage tools. The number below either series indicates the amount of shot the bar will dispense. For example a 302-118 is a single-stage charge bar and will drop 1-1/8 oz. of shot. Powder holes only are bored to accept bushings. It is mandatory that your order for bars includes both the series number and the weight of the shot charge.

products.name: MEC Single Stage Lead Shot Charge Bar - 1 1/4 oz
products.description:
Although there are different charge bars manufactured by this company the MEC Single Stage Lead Shot Charge Bar is among the more popular. This quick change charge bar is constructed from anodized aluminum which guarantees it can withstand harsh conditions. This bar is made for removable powder charge bushings needed to adjust charges of powder with the bushings being sold separately.

Designed for MEC single-stage shotshell presses this bar includes a soft insert that prevents shearing hard shot or larger shot. Keep in mind that steel shot and lead shot charge bars are not intended to be interchanged.

products.name: MEC Single Stage Lead Shot Charge Bar - 1 1/8 oz
products.description:
Although there are different charge bars manufactured by this company the MEC Single Stage Lead Shot Charge Bar is among the more popular. This quick change charge bar is constructed from anodized aluminum which guarantees it can withstand harsh conditions. This bar is made for removable powder charge bushings needed to adjust charges of powder with the bushings being sold separately.

Designed for MEC single-stage shotshell presses this bar includes a soft insert that prevents shearing hard shot or larger shot. Keep in mind that steel shot and lead shot charge bars are not intended to be interchanged.

products.name: MEC Rubber Grommet
products.description:
MEC has a long history of excellence in the reloading industry and uses only the highest-quality materials and workmanship for high-dollar items as well as for manufacturing smaller parts including the MEC Rubber Grommet. Although this is an inexpensive replacement part it plays a key role in the overall operation of reloading. For that reason many reloaders will keep several extra grommets on hand.

This rubber grommet is strong and durable and designed to fit the MEC powder bottle. The grommet goes through the same precision engineering and quality-control checks as all other MEC products.

products.name: MEC Brass Washer
products.description: A mistake that some reloaders make is not paying attention to the details. Every tool and accessory used in reloading needs to be of the highest quality possible including something simple like the MEC brass washer. These small replacement parts are not just nice to have on hand

products.name: MEC Primer Seat Assembly Package
products.description:
In addition to being made in the United States the MEC Primer Seat Assembly Package is manufactured by a company with years in the business of reloading. MEC carefully engineers all of its products and runs each through a strict quality-control check to ensure the highest-quality materials and workmanship possible. Because of this MEC has become a trusted brand.

This primer seat assembly package is competitively priced and an excellent accessory to have on hand. With this reloaders find sessions easier quicker and more efficient which results in better quality and more consistent loads.

products.name: MEC Primer Cup
products.description:
Designed for the 600 Jr. 700 Versamc and Sizemaster the MEC Primer Cup is an inexpensive but handy accessory to have on hand. Sometimes parts become damaged or break completely; instead of stopping a reloading session having extra parts on hand allows you to continue without interruption.

MEC puts just as much pride in the manufacturing of the primer cup as it does its higher-dollar items. This cup enhances the reloading process is made from quality materials and has excellent workmanship. Reloaders feel confident with this and all MEC purchases because the products have been proven to perform.

products.name: MEC Spring
products.description:
A MEC Spring may be small but for reloading it is just as important as the larger and more expensive items used. MEC began in 1972 when the first coiling machine was launched. Since that time over 30 different spring machines have been manufactured as well as replacement parts like this spring.

In addition to multi-axis spring formers coiling machines for extra fine wire spring formers torsion spring machines and extension spring machines the company now has over 5000 machines throughout the world. For people who do reloading on a MEC spring machine this replacement part is imperative.

products.name: MEC Spring Pad
products.description:
The MEC Spring Pad is designed to fit any gauge of the MEC progressive loader manufactured after 1982 including the 650 Grabber and 9000 Series. This cost-efficient product is made by a company with years in the business of reloading; in order to bear the MEC name it was precision manufactured and passed strict quality-control measures.

This spring pad is made in the United States from quality materials and workmanship and comes with a solid guarantee that it will provide years of outstanding service for reloaders.

products.name: MEC E-Z Prime Automatic Primer Feed
products.description:
For years MEC has been manufacturing some of the highest-quality reloading products on the market with MEC EC Primer 650 being just one example. This company strives to offer novice and seasoned reloaders the same level of service with the goal being to enhance accuracy and performance.

The EC Primer 650 is an excellent product used for high-volume reloading. With this every session is maximized. This primer is made for Progressive presses and includes a plastic tray with metal brackets. In addition the product is backed with a solid company guarantee.

  • Automatic Primer feed for 650. Grabber and Hustler

products.name: MEC Resize Rings
products.description:
MEC Resize Rings are located on the depriming stations for the MEC 600 Jr. reloaders. For reloaders who spend a lot of time reloading these rings wear down and break. In addition there are times when the rings do not completely resize hulls to the appropriate specs. In these conditions having extra rings on hand makes perfect sense.

To ensure optimal resizing performance the manufacturer recommends these rings be replaced occasionally based on the volume of reloading done. If resizing hulls becomes an issue the MEC Supersizer might be an alternative solution.

products.description:

The numbers of the series are what determine the amount of shot that will be dispensed by the charge bar. Keep in mind that powder holes are bored only to accept bushings.

MEC has a longstanding reputation for manufacturing the highest-quality and longest-lasting presses and accessories on the market. As a result there are products for both novice and seasoned reloaders alike.

products.name: MEC Primer Seat- Single Stage
products.description:
When choosing a primer seat the seating depth must be determined which is how far the primer is inserted into the case. If the primer is seated too deep below flush internal components can be damaged which causes inconsistent ignition and misfires.

On the other hand seating too high which would be above the flush prevents rotation of cylinders in revolvers. For semiautomatics it can create problems when the bolt slams. Because this is so important only the best product should be purchased which is why reloaders depend on the MEC Primer Seat.

products.name: MEC Pro Check
products.description:
The MEC Pro Check is a must-have accessory if you frequently use the Model 600JR loader. This MEC Pro Check can be attached to your charge bar using the bar-stop screw. Once attached the MEC Pro Check programs your charge bar to keep the loading cycle in the proper sequence it also facilitates automatic operation of the wad guide.

For reloaders who prefer the Model 600JR loader this MEC Pro Check is definitely a handy tool to have around. For a small price you can enjoy the benefits this MEC Pro Check has to offer it is incredibly easy to use.

products.name: MEC Bottle for MEC Shotshell Press - Large
products.description:
For the highest-quality shotshell presses that provide outstanding reloading session after session a high-volume reloader is required. For reloaders there is an array of different pieces of equipment tools and accessories that make loading fun fast efficient and safe. One of these is the MEC bottle which is always nice to have on hand.

In fact many reloaders will purchase two bottles keeping one filled with a different size shot or powder which helps make load changes go quicker. Of course the manufacturer reminds reloaders to always mark the contents of the bottle clearly to avoid unwanted accidents.

products.name: MEC Measure Assembly
products.description:

This assembly consists of precision ground slides and surfaces in a perfectly made primary casting that ensures a precision fit. Accurate measures are critical when reloading so MEC goes to great lengths to ensure the product surpasses expectations.

MEC is trusted because everyone at the company is also a shooting or reloading enthusiast. Because of this products are designed and manufactured the way they would want which means customers always get the best.

products.name: MEC Reloading Die Kit for Model 600 Jr. Mark 5
products.description:
Competitively priced the MEC Reloading Die Kit for Model 600 Jr. Mark 5 handles a variety of calibers including 10 12 16 20 and 28 gauge as well as .410 Bore. This die kit is made from high-quality materials and is manufactured by a reputable company that stands behind its products.

products.name: MEC Shell Checker
products.description:
The MEC Shell Checker is a convenient part to have on hand. Used by novice and seasoned reloaders alike this tool ensures that reloaded shells have the ability to chamfer properly. This checker has precision machined holes which are clearly labeled either GO or NO GO when testing both roundness and size.

The shell checker is made from durable stainless steel and is designed to handle 10 12 16 20 and 28 gauges as well as .410 Bore. The shell checker is affordably priced and in order to bear the MEC name it must pass strict quality-control checks.

products.name: MEC 8567N Grabber Shotshell Reloader
products.description:
For speed efficiency and precision operation with reloading the MEC 8567N Grabber is hard to beat. This offers six stations for producing a finished shell with each handle stroke. The primer feed is completely automatic has auto-cycle charging and is designed with a three-stage crimp.

This grabber also boasts a power ring which ensures shells are more consistently accurate for the ultimate shooting performance. The grabber is perfectly engineered and if wanted there is an optional kit that makes it possible to reload 3-inch shells for 12- and 20-gauge cartridges.

products.name: MEC Dust Cover
products.description:
The MEC Dust Cover protects MEC reloaders by keeping them clean and dust-free. This dust cover is designed to fit the 9000 Series Sizemaster Hustler and Grabber reloaders equipped with 12-inch shot bottles.

The dust cover is constructed from a strong and durable canvas material and has a nice tapered fit. The cover stays securely in place with a hook and loop closure and measures 11 1/2 x 13 1/2 inches at the base 7 1/2 by 11 inches at the top and 31 1/2 inches high. The cover is easy to use and works great making it popular among people who do home reloading.

products.name: MEC Bottle Support for Progressive Models
products.description:
MEC Bottle Support for Progressive Models is popular among people who do a lot of reloading. This heavy-duty bottle support is designed to keep bottles steady which is essential during reloading sessions. In addition this support is ideal for holding the bottle firmly in place when tipping back bushings or charge bars.

Made from strong and durable steel this bottle support is available for both single-shot and progressive type presses. This bottle support is competitively priced and an excellent addition. As with all MEC products the support is precision made and required to pass tight quality-control checks.

products.name: MEC Bottle Support for Single Stage Models
products.description:
MEC Bottle Support for Single Stages is ideal for keeping bottles securely in place when reloading. This support is made from heavy-duty steel and also is great for keep bottles secure when tipping back bushings or charge bars. To ensure every reloading session is the best and safest possible it is important to use the appropriate equipment tools and accessories including a bottle support.

This type of support is available for progressive presses as well. This support offers outstanding workmanship; in order to be sold to the public MEC products undergo careful monitoring testing and strict quality-control checks.

products.name: MEC E-Z Progressive Primer Feed - Large Capacity
products.description:
The MEC E-Z Progressive Primer Feed is one of the company's top-selling products and for good reason. For people who enjoy reloading this is a trusted brand and the primer feed works incredibly well. This feed is made for Progressive presses ranging in caliber from 12 gauge to .410 Bore. With this product presses can be converted to automatic priming which saves time.

Included with this primer feed are a tray assembly actuator chain and bracket assembly for easy mounting. Large Capacity Progressive Primer Feed for 650 76 series 8567 grabber and 9000 Series/

products.name: MEC 9000GN Shotshell Reloader-12ga.
products.description:
For seasoned reloaders the MEC 9000GN Reloader is the ideal choice. This press is of the highest quality and comes loaded with features including a shell ejection automatic indexing capability E-Z Prime primer feeder and 10 operations for six stations. Made specifically for reloading 12-gauge cartridges this reloader is set at 2 3/4 inches.

The reloader is made from strong and durable steel has an auto cycle for charging and comes with a power ring resizer that ensures shells are consistently sized for extreme accuracy. As a result overall shooting performance is enhanced.

products.name: Gemtech Patrolman Suppressor 5.56 Titanium Thread Mount 1/2-28 Black USED
products.description: The GEMTECH PATROLMAN is part of their line of Extreme Duty suppressors these suppressors meet the stringent SOCOM Military standards and are optimized for use on short barreled full auto firearms. The baffle stack has been constructed differently than in the past and an increase in Inconel gives this suppressor its hardcore properties. In addition to the hardcore inside the outside has been updated to include the NEW logo endcap.

products.name: Gemtech Rifle ONE Compact Titanium Suppressor 5.56mm-300 Win Mag  Direct Thread or QD(requires Quickmount) USED
products.description:
GEMTECH has answered customer demand with our newest addition to our Extreme Duty line. With caliber ratings from short 5.56 full-auto to 300WM it's the only rifle suppressor you'll ever need. Made of Titanium and Inconel not only does it perform to SOCOM standards but it won't weigh down your overall set-up.

Requires QD mount for QD

Specifications:

  • Caliber: 5.56mm
  • Sound Tested: 139dB Colt® M4 5.56 11.5" | 137dB Arsenal SAM7R 7.62x39 16" | 138dB NEMO® X0 .308 16" | 118dB Ruger® 10/22® 18.5" | 130dB Rem® 700 300BLK 20" | 136dB Marlin 336C 30-30 20"
  • Diameter: 1.625"
  • Overall Length: 7.75"
  • Weight: 16.9 oz.
  • Mount Type: Quickmount™ or Threadmount
  • Tube Material: Titanium

This MTM Shell and Wad Hopper Set not only helps you to achieve a faster reloading process but it will make your reloading bench look great as well. This set of shells and wads are sold together to make sure that you never again have to deal with the hassle of sorting through empty hulls and wads.

This MTM Shell and Wad Hopper Set can hold up to 300 12-gauge hulls or up to 500 wads which makes it perfect for the high-volume reloader. Like all of MTM

products.description: Mossberg 12 Gauge Pistol Grip Kit with grip bolt flat washer lock washer rear stud front stud and washer. Allen wrench included. Fits 12 Gauge 500 590 590A1 535 835 and Maverick 88 models.

products.name: Midwest Industries Alpha Series Picatinny Folding Stock Black
products.description:
Features:

  • Compatible with firearms that include 1913 rail adaptor
  • Shipped for rifle use also compatible with Gear Head Works tailhook for arm brace use. Cosmetic arm brace plug sold separately to ensure the back beam is smooth.
  • Adjustable polymer cheek piece for comfortable use with all users
  • Adjustable butt pad for increased usability with plate carriers or heavy gear
  • 5 position locking beam with textured button for quick adjustment
  • Heavy-duty side-folding mechanism constructed from 4140 heat treated steel
  • Reversable design for left-handed shooters
  • Full-length locking lug for maximum strength
  • Solid positive lock up in both positions
  • Steel clamp with large surface engagement
  • Can be configured to right or left folding
  • Features 3 QD sling attachments
  • Curved adjustable top surface for a comfortable cheek weld
  • Adds 8.0” to overall firearm length
  • Adds 0.75” to the length of the firearm in the folded position
  • Constructed of high strength polymer aluminum and steel components
  • Weight: 1lb 5oz.
  • Made in the USA
  • Lifetime warranty

products.name: Midwest Industries Drop In Trigger Kit with Lower Parts Ambi Safety Black
products.description:
Features:

  • 3.5lb Single-stage trigger system
  • Allows you shoot more accurately with less effort
  • Ultra-smooth break with a crisp clean release
  • Fits small pin size (.154)
  • Quick reset and low overtravel for enhanced speed
  • Interior parts are S7 tool steel with heavy-hit hardening then black nitride finished for enhanced strength and corrosion resistance
  • Lightened trigger pull (3.5-lb. pull weight)
  • Lightened hammer
  • Drop safety feature
  • Self-contained design makes it easy and quick to install with no fine-tuning needed
  • Unit weight: 2.4 oz.
  • CNC machined from high-grade heat-treated tool steel and aluminum
  • Blue anodized aluminum cassette housing
  • Fits most .308 and .223 AR style platforms
  • Anti-walk pins and screws included.
  • Ambi Safety Selector 60 / 90 degree option
  • Magpul Trigger Guard – MAG417
  • Midwest Industries products are backed by a limited lifetime guarantee.
  • 100% Made in USA

Note: The center set screw should not be tampered with. Any attempts to modify the trigger will void the warranty.

PARTS INCLUDED

  1. Bolt Catch
  2. Bolt Catch Plunger
  3. Bolt Catch Spring
  4. Bolt Catch Roll Pin
  5. Mag Catch Lever
  6. Mag Catch Button
  7. Mag Catch Spring
  8. Buffer Retainer Spring
  9. Ambi Safety Selector – 60 / 90 degree option
  10. Buffer Retainer
  11. Safety Selector Detent Spring
  12. Safety Selector Detent
  13. Black Magpul Trigger Guard – MAG417
  14. 2 x Take-down Detent Springs
  15. 2 x Take-down Pin Detent
  16. Take-down Pin – Rear
  17. Pivot Pin - Front
  18. MI-TRIGGER-C – Midwest Industries Enhanced AR15 Drop in Curved Trigger 3.5lb Single Stage
  19. Anti-Walk Pins

products.name: Fab Defense GL-CORE CP Buttstock with Adjustable Cheek-Rest for Milspec and Commercial Tubes Black
products.description:
The GL-CORE incorporates an integrated cheek weld ergonomic buttpad and interchanging tube adapters that provide an unmatched fit on Mil-Spec and Commercial buffer tubes. The CP version includes an additional Cheek Rest designed to support the use of different optics and holographic sights on the AK and VZ platforms.

Features:

  • Ergonomically shaped rubberized butt-pad for quick shouldering and easy maneuvering of the weapon
  • Interchangeable buffer tube adapters for a tight fit on Mil-Spec and Commercial buffer tubes
  • Integrated cheek weld in an overall compact and sleek design
  • No protruding parts will not get caught on gear or webbing
  • Inversed positioning lever will not open accidently
  • Two integrated quick detach rear sling swivel connectors
  • Additional three positions adjustable Cheek-Rest
  • Made of durable and light-weight fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

products.name: FAB Defense GL-CORE S CQB Optimized Combat Stock
products.description:
The GL-ORE S was specifically designed for one of the best Israeli Counter-Terrorism units to be used as a primary buttstock.

The design process started with the GL-CORE buttstock and implemented all the design changes that were requested to create a buttstock that will be short and compact for CQB scenarios but will still provide strength and stability for mid-range engagements.

Features:

  • Small and compact allowing for easy maneuverability during CQB
  • Flat faced rubberized butt-pad designed for use with and without tactical body armor
  • Interchangeable buffer tube adapters for a tight fit on Mil-Spec and Commercial buffer tubes
  • Integrated cheek weld optimized for the M4/AR15 platforms
  • No protruding parts will not get caught on gear or webbing
  • Inversed positioning lever will not open accidently
  • Two integrated quick detach rear sling swivel connectors
  • Made of durable and light-weight fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

products.name: Fab Defense RAPS Rapid Adjustment Precision Stock
products.description:
The RAPS incorporates the mandatory features for a precision stock; integrated Cheek Rest and adjustable Length Of Pull (LOP) but with the added benefits of easy manipulation reduced weight and cutting edge features and materials. The RAPS to enable any size shooter to engage their target from any position in a quick and precise manner.

The RAPS allows for a wide range of adjustment that can be done with one hand while keeping your eyes downrange using our patent-pending 1Latch system and is the first of its kind with a memory feature that returns the adjustable LOP to its pre-set position.

The RAPS also features an integrated Cheek Rest with a height adjustment of up to + 42mm and a generous non-slip rubber butt-pad with 10mm of height adjustment.

Manufactured with extremely durable polymer composite the RAPS will withstand years of hard use under adverse conditions from the battlefield to long-range matches the RAPS stock will help you get the job done!

Features:

  • Integrated Cheek Rest & adjustable Length Of Pull (LOP)
  • Patent-pending 1Latch system locks both LOP and Cheek Rest height with one lever
  • Latch system can be configured for right or left-hand shooters
  • New LOP memory feature set it once and the adjustable butt-pad will spring out to the same length every time
  • LOP Adjustment Range: 32mm (1.26”)
  • Integrated Cheek Rest adjustment range; 42mm (1.65”)
  • Adjustable LOP on AR10 from 378mm to 410mm (14.8”-16.14”)
  • Concealed picatinny rail at the bottom of the stock for use with a monopod
  • Heavy duty rubber butt-pad with height adjustment
  • The RAPS includes one per-installed adapter for rifle-length receiver extension tube and two additional adapters for MIL-SPEC Carbine tubes (one for M4 type receivers and one universal)
  • Easy installation no gunsmith required

products.name: Fab Defense UAS Precision Stock PRO Conversion Kit for Ruger 10/22
products.description:
The R10/22 UAS Precision Stock PRO Conversion Kit presents a high quality and ability enhancing upgrade for the Ruger 10/22.

This unique stock offers the perfect combination of a classic bench-rest design with a modern tactical versatility and buttstock features.

Advantages:

  • Ventilated 6061 T6 Billet aluminum Handguard and upper rails
  • 1913 MIL-STD Picatinny upper sides and lower rails
  • Allow secure mounting of any picatinny based optics and accessories
  • Quick and easy drop-in installation
  • Built-in adjustable cheek-rest with 5 height options
  • Side folding buttstock (left folding by default) for compact carry and storage
  • Quick-Detach sling swivel sockets on both sides
  • Ergonomic design prevents wrist fatigue and ensures secure grip
  • Finger grooves and backstrap shape improves trigger operation
  • Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction
  • Incorporates a 25 years limited lifetime warranty

Compatibility:

  • Standard barreled Ruger 10/22 rifles
  • All 1913 MIL-STD picatinny based optics and accessories

This unique stock offers the perfect combination of a classic bench-rest design with a modern tactical versatility and buttstock features.

Advantages:

  • 1913 MIL-STD Picatinny upper sides and lower rails
  • Allow secure mounting of any picatinny based optics and accessories

products.name: FAB Defense GL CORE M M4 Survival Buttstock with Built-in Mag Carrier Black
products.description:
The CORE M has a built-in concealed AR15/M16/M4 Magazine Carrier that will accommodate all standard 5.56x45 (.223 Rem) AR15/M16/M4 and FAB Defense Ultimag Magazines. Whether it’s your accuracy or numerous target engagements you can depend on your last ten chances with the FAB Defense "Survival" AR15 Butt-stock w/Built-in 10r Magazine Carrier.. The CORE M AR15 Stock has a unique Anti-Rattle mechanism that holds the stock firmly in place on your AR15 tube eliminating any unnecessary rattle furthermore the butt-stocks butt-pad in made out of a high-quality rubber to prevent it from slipping while shooting and enhancing the grip on the shooter's shoulder. The stock will fit both MIL-SPEC and Commercial tubes.

Advantages:

  • Sleek design with no protruding parts will not get caught on gear or webbing
  • Keeps all of the characteristics of the M4 buttstock while incorporating a State of the Art magazine carrier
  • Positioned close by for convenient mag change providing you with the edge you need
  • Incorporates a quick release button for swift clip change
  • Does not interfere or change ’ buttstock to shoulder’ positioning
  • Integrated ambidextrous quick detach rear sling swivel connectors
  • Fits on both Mil-Spec and commercial tubes
  • Made with fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

products.description:

products.name: Nightstick Shotgun Forend Light with White Light Black for Remington 870/TAC-14
products.description:
This shotgun forend weapon light is a complete forend replacement for your 12 gauge Remington® 870 or TAC-14 pump-action shotgun. Built from a one-piece body of heavy-duty glass-filled nylon with an over-molded rubber grip area it features a super-bright LED rated at 1200 lumens with an hour and a half runtime. Designed around a high-efficiency deep parabolic reflector the tightly focused beam has a 203-meter beam distance.

The SFL forend features ambidextrous switches positioned intuitively towards the front for easy activation. Both buttons are surrounded by a small raised bump guard that helps prevent accidental activation while racking the action or laying it on its side. The light also features an ergonomic palm swell design to improve grip during light activation and weapon manipulation under stress.

Each SFL comes with an optional hand stop/safety strap and Nightstick's SFL action tube nut wrench for removal of factory-installed castle nut and pump handle fore-end. Comes with two CR123 batteries but can be upgraded to li-ion rechargeable with optional 18650-KIT. Limited lifetime warranty.

products.description: The Ambidextrous Bolt Release is an indispensable device that easily releases or holds bolt open with one hand to streamline firearm clearing and reloading after a malfunction. By being ambidextrous this bolt release eliminates hand changeovers improving control of rifle when in use. Made from hardened aircraft aluminum. Available in Black.

products.name: Troy Enhanced Trigger Guard SGUA-AMB-00BT-00
products.description: The Enhanced Trigger Guard allocates user with easy access to the trigger while wearing gloves and opens trigger area even in extreme conditions. With no sharp edges or corners this trigger guard fills width gap on receivers. The Enhanced Trigger Guard is machined from hardened aircraft aluminum and rotates down like a standard trigger guard.

products.name: Troy Industries Troy Rail Cover 6.2  - Black 3/ct
products.description: Troy Rail Covers easily slide onto a MIL-STD Picatinny Rail and locks into place with a built-in retaining clip and can be adjusted with a bullet tip; no tools required. Constructed from durable heat and chemical-resistant synthetic polymer resin each rail cover is scientifically engineered and proven to reduce heat transfer and hand abrasions. Available in a single or three pack. Patent Pending.

products.name: Troy Barrel Nut - Standard
products.description: The Troy Standard AR15 Barrel Nut is a rugged alternative to standard barrel nuts.

products.name: Troy Tomahawk 5.56 Stock - Black
products.description:
A BattleAx for the 21st Century: the new TROY Tomahawk Stock. The Tomahawk is a modern combat-tactical PDW-style retractable stock with an integrated cheek piece that elevates 5.56/.300 Blackout and 7.62 carbines making them powerful compact and ultra lightweight.

Utilizing a MIL-SPEC bolt carrier group the Tomahawk Standard (5.56/7.62) shortens overall length by 2" compared to an M4 stock. The impact-resistant polymer cheek-piece with QD swivel mount provides stability and comfort; the aluminum thumb-latch and guide rails offer superior strength and five positions of adjustment.

Available in Black FDE.

FEATURES:

  • Retractable multi-position compact stock
  • Machine hardened aircraft aluminum rails & latch
  • Ultra lightweight polymer buttstock and continuous cheek piece
  • Only 10.4oz. (16.9oz with Spring and Buffer)
  • Available for 5.56/.300 and 7.62
  • Tomahawk Standard uses MIL-SPEC bolt carrier group
  • Tomahawk Short uses TROY proprietary buffer & bolt combo
  • Q.D. swivel hole for sling attachment
  • Available in Black Tan and Flat Dark Earth

Note: Not Compatable with TROY Ambidextrous Bolt Release
Not Compatable with Primary Weapons Systems AR

products.description:
TROY Squid Grips are a patented rail insert composed of advanced rubber that is extremely heat resistant and durable. The Squid Grips insert directly into the cooling holes; they can be inserted end to end for longer lengths or cut to form any custom length. Made specifically for M-LOK rails.

Features:

  • Heat and abrasion resistant
  • Insert directly into cooling holes
  • Can be cut to fill custom lengths
