products.description:
The Shock Shield is the simple solution to reducing recoil in a variety of rifles and shotguns. No need for different size pads as its one size design stretches and contours to a variety of stock shapes and dimensions. Filled with a pocket of soft gel felt recoil is greatly reduced. Easy on and easy off. Simply stretch it over the butt of your firearm.

Features:

  • Extensively tested for years of use!
  • Soft gel pad for greatly reduced recoil
  • One size stretches to fit most rifles and shotguns
  • Easy on and easy off
  • Won?t harm stocks
  • Non-slip pad face texture

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Primer Pocket Swage Tool 223/5.56mm Only
products.description: The Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Primer Pocket Swage Tool quickly and cleanly removes crimps on cartridge case primer pockets. Designed to be used on the Lock-N-Load AP press the Lock-N-Load AP Primer Pocket Swage Tool comes with shell holder feed swage tool and eject dies to make your job easier. Available in 223 Rem/5.56 and 308 Win/7.62 models swage depth can be adjusted to accommodate various brands of cases. Swaging out the crimps instead of cutting them eliminates trimmings and mess.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Primer Pocket Swage Tool 7.62x51/308 Only
products.description: The Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Primer Pocket Swage Tool quickly and cleanly removes crimps on cartridge case primer pockets. Designed to be used on the Lock-N-Load AP press the Lock-N-Load AP Primer Pocket Swage Tool comes with shell holder feed swage tool and eject dies to make your job easier. Available in 223 Rem/5.56 and 308 Win/7.62 models swage depth can be adjusted to accommodate various brands of cases. Swaging out the crimps instead of cutting them eliminates trimmings and mess.

products.name: Hornady Die Maintenance Kit
products.description:
The Hornady Die Maintenance Kit includes everything the serious reloader like you needs to keep your dies in working order. This kit was specifically designed for use with the Hornady Custom Grade New Dimension line of dies giving you a method of keeping your dies working just like new.

Included in the Hornady Die Maintenance Kit are the following: two replacement spindle rods three replacement large decapping pins a replacement die locking ring one replacement expander and five replacement shellholder retaining rings. What more could you need?

products.name: Hornady Zip Spindle Kit
products.description:
The Hornady Zip Spindle Kit is the fastest and easiest way to convert your Hornady Match Grade New Dimension die set to the threaded spindle design. This kit includes both the threaded spindle decapping rod as well as the threaded spindle collet.

The unique Zip Spindle design employs a series of light threads that are cut into both the collet and the spindle

products.name: Hornady Small Caliber Zip Spindle Kit - .17 - .20 Caliber
products.description: The Hornady Small Caliber Zip Spindle Kit is the perfect way to upgrade your Hornady Sizing Die with the new Zip Spindle design. This design utilizes a series of light threads that are cut into both the spindle and the collet

products.name: Hornady Zip Spindle Kit Straight Wall & Pistol
products.description:
The Hornady Custom Grade Die Zip Spindle Kit Straight Wall is the ideal kit for spare parts or for updating an older Hornady Sizing die to utilize the new zip spindle design. The Zip Spindle has a series of light threads cut on the spindle and spindle lock. This eliminates slippage and makes tightening the spindle lock a breeze when adjusting. This kit includes 3 decap pins a zip spindle a spindle lock and a decap pin retainer. Fits: Any pistol caliber (straight wall cartridges) Hornady Custom Grade Sizing Dies.

Kit consists of 3 headed decap pins (#390222) a zip spindle (#398567) a spindle lock (#398731) and a decap pin retainer (#396303). To install remove the spindle assembly from the existing die. Remove and replace the headed decap pin and/or decap pin retainer if necessary and re-attach to the new spindle. Re-install the zip spindle assembly into the sizing die. All die sets shipped in 2006 and later have the threaded style zip spindle. For rifle calibers (bottleneck) use Zip Spindle kit #43400.

products.name: Hornady Sure-loc Die Locking Ring 7/8"-14 Thread - 1 pk.
products.description: Lets you make precise adjustments of all standard 7/8"-14 dies and accessories. Lock Ring clamps around the whole die and can't damage the threads. Applies constant pressure across the threads to hold the ring in place. Wrench Flats allow to remove and replace dies without pliers ruining the lock ring. 1-pack.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Die Bushing 3pk
products.description:
Sold in a 3- and 10-pack the Hornady Lock-N-Load Die Bushing speeds up the die changing process from one system to another. Because of this this bushing has become a popular and trusted product for people who enjoy reloading. This bushing has a unique and patented Lock-N-Load technology that ensures excellence.

This bushing is designed for use with any brand of press that can accommodate the Hornady press conversion bushing. As with all Hornady products the Lock-N-Load Die Bushing is made from high-quality materials and required to pass strict quality control checks before being sold.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Die Bushing - 2pk (male)
products.description:

products.description:
Smply thread a Hornady® Lock-N-Load® Conversion Kit into your RCBS® Rock Chucker or other reloading press using a 1¼"-12 thread and you're ready to start using the Lock-N-Load® System.

It's the easiest way to get the most out of your reloading press. These bushings let you take advantage of Hornady's® Lock-N-Load® technology even if you own a competitors reloading press.

products.description:

products.description:
For reloading the Hornady Lock-N-Load Press Conversion Bushing Kit is an ideal accessory. The bushing is simply inserted into a reloading press like the RCBS Rock Chucker with a 1 _-inch-12 thread. In just seconds the innovative technology of this Lock-N-Load bushing conversion is ready to go.

To get the most possible from a competitor

products.name: Hornady Sure-Loc Die Locking Ring 7/8"-14 Thread - 6/ct
products.description: The Hornady Sure-Loc Die Locking Ring Set is the perfect addition to your standard 7/8-inchx14 threaded die. The design of this locking ring makes sure that the tightened screw does not come into contact with the threads of the die

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load LED Light Strip
products.description:
Light up your press with the Hornady® Lock-N-Load® Light Strip. With an adhesive backing the Lock-N-Load Light Strip can be used on any press or location on your reloading bench for extra light to help eliminate shadows making safety and quality checks easier than ever. The Lock-N-Load® Light Strip features LED lights for a long life and plugs into a standard 110V outlet or Lock-N-Load Control Panel.

Features:

  • Eliminates shadows
  • LED lights for long life cycle
  • Plugs into a standard 110V outlet or Lock-N-Load Control Panel

products.name: Hornady Powder Cop Die
products.description:
The Hornady Powder Cop Die is manufactured by a company with more than 60 years of making some of the best reloading products on the market. For that reason this and other Hornady products are 100 percent trusted by consumers.

This steel cop die is made to fit the majority of progressive presses that have a 7/8-inch-14 thread. To use this die it is installed following the powder drop station. With this dropped charges can be checked automatically. This die features an internal stem that moves up to show the O-ring even with the die

products.name: Hornady Case Activated Powder Drop
products.description:
The Hornady Case Activated Powder Drop was specifically designed for use with the Hornady Lock-n-Load AP press though it can also be used with other progressive presses. This powder drop dispenses powder charges automatically but only when the case is actually present.

The Hornady Case Activated Powder Drop comes with everything you need except for the powder measure which is sold separately. It does however come with a quick-change powder die. The activator for the Hornady Case Activated Powder Drop works with most standard 7/8-inch-14 threaded dies.

products.name: Hornady Quick Change Powder Die (Bushing not included)
products.description:
The Hornady Quick Change Powder Die comes in a wide range of diameters based on the desired results. The die is designed to be used with the Hornady Case Activated Powder Drop Powder through Expanders and Quick Change Powder Die used for reloading cartridges for pistols.

Included with the die is a lower bracket complete with lock ring and guide brushing. With this expanding the mouth of the case can be done to perfection. Along with the die this product comes with a powder measure insert; together they ensure faster caliber changes.

products.name: Hornady Depriming and Decapping Die - Universal
products.description:
The Hornady Universal Depriming and Decapping Die is a must-have tool for the serious reloader who needs a fast and efficient method for depriming and decapping brass all at once. This tool is highly versatile able to accommodate a variety of cartridge case sizes from the .223 Remington and up.

If you are looking for an easy-to-use tool that deprimes and decaps brass at the same time both quickly and efficiently look no further than the Hornady Universal Depriming and Decapping Die. This die is made from high-quality materials to ensure a lifetime of durable performance.

products.name: Hornady LOCK-N-LOAD AP Deluxe Spent Primer Catcher
products.description: The AP™ Deluxe Primer Catcher fits the Lock-N-Load® AP™ press. Decapped primers drop into the tube and travel to the bottle where they can be collected for future disposal.

products.name: Hornady Decapping Pins Large 6pk
products.description:
0.25 lbs

RCBS offers a variety of decapping pins for all reloading needs. Headed pins are for most current production expander-decapping and decapping rods. Small pins are for pre-1990s collet-style rods designed for small-primer cartridges as well as for current competition-style dies/rods X Die mandrels PPC and .357 Sig. Large pins are designed for collet-style rods for large primer cartridges as well as for current competition-style dies/rods 7 TCU and 35 Whelen. Straight-styles are meant for use with .50 BMG .416 Barrett and .460 Steyr.

products.name: Hornady Decapping Pins Small 6pk
products.description: RCBS offers a variety of decapping pins for all reloading needs. Headed pins are for most current production expander-decapping and decapping rods. Small pins are for pre-1990s collet-style rods designed for small-primer cartridges as well as for current competition-style dies/rods X Die mandrels PPC and .357 Sig. Large pins are designed for collet-style rods for large primer cartridges as well as for current competition-style dies/rods 7 TCU and 35 Whelen. Straight-styles are meant for use with .50 BMG .416 Barrett and .460 Steyr.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load IRON PRESS Auto Prime System Upgrade
products.description:
Representing the next evolution in single stage press technology the Lock-N-Load Iron Press loader is built to be the heaviest most rigid press in its class. Tight tolerances in manufacture and assembly combine to provide consistency and precision that will deliver match accurate ammunition round-after-round year-after-year.

Upgrades your manual IRON PRESS prime system to auto.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Reloading Press with EZject System - No Shell Plate
products.description:
The Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Progressive Press with Ezject also known as the Hornady LNL AP makes it possible to change metering inserts in a snap. Going from one powder to another has never been easier all with the simple press of a button. This Hornady progressive press is perfect for those seeking a seamless reloading experience during changeovers.

The Hornady Lock-n-Load AP press is ingeniously designed with a retainer spring allowing for swift case removal and replacement. Ensuring smooth operation it also boasts an automatic system for indexing. Every station on this Hornady Lock-n-Load APprogressive press is designed to move one-half stage on both upstroke and downstroke. And as with all Hornady products product number Hornady 095100 comes with an unwavering guarantee.

Includes:

  • Lock-N-Load powder measure
  • Rifle and pistol metering assemblies
  • Case activated powder drop and linkage
  • Cartridge catcher
  • Large and small primer pick-up tubes
  • 5 Lock-N-Load Bushings

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Precision Reloaders Accessory Kit
products.description:
The Hornady Precision Reloader Accessory Kit will allow you the opportunity to produce the most accurate reloads possible.

INCLUDES:

  • Concentricity Tool
  • Cam Lock Trimmer
  • Cam Lock Power Adapter
  • Lock-N-Load OAL Gauge Curved
  • Lock-N-Load Comparator Set
  • Lock-N-Load Headspace Kit
  • Lock-N-Load Case Prep Trio
  • Steel Dial Caliper

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Automatic Case Feeder
products.description:
The Hornady Lock-N-Load Automatic Case Feeder is for high-volume reloading making every session quicker and easier. This case feeder is designed with the highest torque motor available as well as an extremely large case bowl capable of holding more than 750 .223 Remington cases.

In addition this case feeder ensures the LNL AP can load at a rate of more than 750 rounds per hour of high-quality ammunition. Everything needed is included with this feeder and for a competitive price. For changeovers this case feeder is the ideal solution making it a popular choice.

The Lock-N-Load Case Feeder comes complete with everything you need except the case feeder plates which are sold separately.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Automatic Case Feeder Handgun Plate
products.description:
The Hornady Lock-N-Load Automatic Case Feeder Handgun Plate is a required accessory that makes reloading sessions easier. This particular plate is designed for both small and large pistols and rifles and backed by a company with a long history of providing excellent products for reloading purposes.

For pistols this plate is ideal for 9mm Luger 9x18 Makarov .32 ACP .32 Short and Long Colt .32 S&W 10mm Auto .38 Special .41 Magnum .22 Remington .256 Winchester Magnum and .480 Ruger among others. For rifles the plate works for .17 Remington .222 Remington Magnum .300 Winchester Magnum .35 Whelen and more.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Automatic Case Feeder Handgun Plate
products.description:

For rifles the plate works for .17 Remington .222 Remington Magnum .300 Winchester Magnum .35 Whelen and more.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Automatic Case Feeder Rifle Plate
products.description:
The Hornady Lock-N-Load Automatic Case Feeder Rifle Plate is made from strong plastic has an affordable price and comes with a great company guarantee. Hornady has a long history of excellence in the reloading industry. Every product manufactured is precisely engineered and made to last.

This plate works for small and large pistols but also small and large rifles. The plate is ideal for the .218 Bee .22 Hornet .222 Remington and .30 Carbine. However it also works for large rifle cartridges such as the .30-30 Winchester .300 Winchester Magnum .35 Whelen and .416 Rigby among others.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Automatic Case Feeder Rifle Plate
products.description:
The Hornady Lock-N-Load Automatic Case Feeder Rifle Plate is made from strong plastic has an affordable price and comes with a great company guarantee. Hornady has a long history of excellence in the reloading industry. Every product manufactured is precisely engineered and made to last.

This plate works for small and large pistols but also small and large rifles. The plate is ideal for the .218 Bee .22 Hornet .222 Remington and .30 Carbine. However it also works for large rifle cartridges such as the .30-30 Winchester .300 Winchester Magnum .35 Whelen and .416 Rigby among others.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Bullet Feeder 110V (7/8" Thread)
products.description:
The new Lock-N-Load Pistol Bullet Feeder is the latest accessory designed for the Hornady Lock-N-Load AP reloading press.

The new Lock-N-Load Pistol Bullet Feeder is designed as an accessory for the Hornady Lock-N-Load AP reloading press but can be used with any other press with 7/8"-14 die threads.

Coupled with the Lock-N-Load Case Feeder you?ll realize dramatic increases in efficiency and reloading speed (up to 50% faster)

The bullet feeder die is case activated which means the bullet will only feed upon contact with a case. The collets are made of solid steel and durable enough for years of reloading.

You?ll discover that setup and caliber changeovers are quick and easy and there are no special tools required for adjustments. The easy-feed bullet hopper holds up to 200 pistol bullets and features an adjustable center plate and bullet feed-wipers to ensure smooth feeding.

With a lifetime warranty the Hornady Lock-N-Load Pistol Bullet Feeder will be around to reload as long as you are! Bullet feeder dies are sold separately.

NOTE: Bullet Feeder is designed for use with jacketed or plated pistol bullets only.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Rifle Bullet Feeder .22 Cal
products.description:
The Lock-N-Load Rifle Bullet Feeder is designed for the Lock-N-Load AP reloading press. Sold as a complete unit for 22 caliber bullets a conversion kit for 30 caliber bullets is also available giving the reloader the versatility to load the two most popular calibers. Plus it?s compatible with other presses and uses the industry standard 7/8? - 14 die threads.

The 22 caliber kit accommodates cartridge sizes from .221 Fireball through 220 Swift. The 30 caliber conversion kit will accomm.odate cartridge sizes from 300 Savage through 300 Rem Ultra Mag.

Coupled with the Lock-N-Load Case Feeder you will realize dramatic increases in efficiency and reloading speed - up to 50 percent faster (based on experience and proficiency).

The Bullet Feeder Die is case activated; the bullet will only feed upon contact with the case. One station is used to feed seat and crimp the bullet.

Note: The new Rifle Bullet Feeder System must be purchased separately from the Hornady Pistol Bullet Feeder because the hopper systems and die bodies are not compatible. Cast lead bullets cannot be used in either Hornady Bullet Feeder.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Rifle Bullet Conversion .30 Cal
products.description: The 30 Cal Conversion kit is an accessory to the Rifle Bullet Feeder. It accommodates cartridge sizes from 300 Savage through 300 Rem Ultra Mag.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Bullet Tube 9mm
products.description:
Turn any progressive press into an ?ammunition factory? with the easy to use Hornady Lock-N-Load Bullet Tubes. Coupled with a Hornady Bullet Feeder die (sold separately) Lock-N-Load Bullet Tubes provide hand loaders a fast flexible system that increases loading speed on any compatible progressive reloading press with 7/8-14 thread die-stations.

With the Lock-N-Load Bullet Tubes the hand loader can simply pre-load the tubes with bullets and place the tube in the top of their bullet feeder die. Tubes can fit 40+ bullets depending on caliber and weight and feature a milled window for visual bullet level inspection.

Lock-N-Load Bullet Tubes are sold in packs of 3 tubes per caliber. Available for 9mm 40cal/10mm & 45cal.

  • Lock-N-Load Bullet Tube feed bullets into existing Hornady bullet feeder dies
  • Tubes come in 3-packs and each can fit 40+ bullets depending on caliber and weight
  • Eliminates the need for a bullet feeder hopper
  • Milled window in tube shows when it is almost empty
  • Suitable for any progressive press with 7/8-14 thread die-stations
  • Available in 9mm 40cal/10mm & 45cal

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Bullet Comparator Insert #10-35 .358 cal
products.description: Bullet Comparator Inserts are designed for use with the Lock-N-Load Bullet Comparator; it elminates variables when measuring the over-all length of a bullet. Bullet length can vary a few thousandths due to material variation and tip finish. The Lock-N-Load Bullet Comparator Inserts allow the reloader to measure the bullet from the base to a specific point on the ogive which has little variation if any. This versatile system also provides the reloader with a much more consistent way to monitor the overall length of their reloads allowing the reloader to build more precision into their handloads that translates into better groups at the range and more meat in the freezer.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Bullet Comparator Insert #11-37 .375 cal
products.description:
Hornady Lock-n-Load Bullet Comparator Inserts are intended to be used with the Hornady Lock-n-Load Bullet Comparator. These inserts come in a variety of sizes to accommodate all of the most popular cartridge calibers and are incredibly easy to use.

To use your Hornady Lock-n-Load Bullet Comparator to measure bullet seating depth simply attach the bullet comparator tool to your caliper blade using a thumbscrew then utilize the proper Hornady Lock-n-Load Bullet Comparator Insert to measure the bullet length from its ogive. This is the best way to eliminate bullet seating depth variation.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Sonic Cleaner Sonic Basket - 1.2 Liter
products.description: Hornady Manufacturing has taken cartridge case cleaning to the next level with the new Lock-N-Load Sonic Cleaner. A combination of intense ultrasonic cleaning action and a unique cleaning solution One Shot Sonic Clean provide an extremely effective and efficient method to remove carbon residue and other foreign materials from the entire case. Unlike tumblers this sonic cleaner quickly cleans the inside of the case as well as primer pockets. The ultrasonic action creates microjets that blast carbon buildup off cases small gun parts and equipment. The Lock-N-Load Sonic Cleaner can hold up to two hundred 223 Rem cases or one hundred 308 Win cases.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Sonic Cleaner Sonic Basket - 2 ltr
products.description:
The Hornady Lock-N-Load Sonic Cleaner 2L is part of Hornady's Lock-N-Load line of ultrasonic cleaners. This particular model's 80-watt ceramic heater boosts cleaning power which is especially useful when using the cleaner for gun parts. Best of all the 2-liter stainless steel tank is capable of holding up to 200 .223 Remington cases or up to 150 .308 Winchester cases.

If you are looking for a quick and efficient ultrasonic cleaner that is guaranteed to remove all foreign materials including carbon residue from your cartridge cases then look no further than the Hornady Lock-N-Load Sonic Cleaner 2L.

products.name: Hornady PTX Universal Powder Drop Expander
products.description:
The Hornady PTX Universal Powder Drop Expander comes in a variety of diameters including .355 .357 .400 .430 .451 .452 .475 .500-inch and others. This drop expander is used for reloading using the Quick Change Powder Die as well as the case-activated powder drop.

With this expander separating the mouth on the case expander die is no longer required. The expander is simply inserted into the powder die and the powder drop then sits on the surface with the powder measure on top. The result is an expanded case mouth to the desired diameter.

products.name: Hornady Powder Through Expanders (PTX) Fit Case Activated Powder Drop .308" .308 cal - 1/pk
products.description: Powder Through Expanders (PTX) are designed to work in conjunction with the Case Activated Powder Drop. These Expanders eliminate the need for a separate case mouth expander die on the Lock-N-Load AP press freeing up an extra station for a taper crimp die or powder cop. The Expanders work for lead plated and jacketed bullets.

products.name: Hornady Shell Holder Package of 5 (1251635)
products.description: Hornady Shell Holders are precision machined from solid steel then heat treated to perform flawlessly for the life of the press. Hornady steel shell holders also fit most other brands of reloading presses. Note: The 50 BMG Shell Holder will only fit the 50 BMG Press and will not fit the other Hornady accessories.

products.name: Hornady Shell Holder #1 - .308 Winchester/.30.06 Springfield/.45 ACP
products.description:
The Hornady Shell Holder is made to help with the reloading of different caliber cartridges including .380 ACP .221 Remington Fireball 6mm TCU .222 Remington Magnum 7x47mm Helm .20 Tactical .204 Ruger and others. products.description: This tool allows for additional length to accommodate shorter cartridges. The Hornady universal extended shellholder is compatible with other Hornady accessories and most other brands of reloading presses and standard shellholders. (Not for use with 50 BMG shell holders.)

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Shell Head Adapter 50 BMG
products.description: The Hornady 50 BMG Lock-N-Load Shell Holder Adapter allows you to reload any standard caliber ammunition on the Hornady Lock-N-Load 50 BMG press. The long ram stroke works well for reloaders who are loading longer cartridges.

products.name: Hornady Reloading Lock-N-Load AP Case Retainer Spring 3/ct
products.description: Hornady Lock N Load Auto Press Case Retainer spring. Quickly and easily remove and/or replace a case from the shell place at any point in the cycle. Case retainer spring fits all calibers. No messing around with retainer pins that are shell plate specific. It's universal with all calibers.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Progressive Press Shell Plate - #1 Size
products.description:
The Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Progressive Press Shellplate comes in a variety of options depending on the type of cartridges being reloaded. However all of the shellplate products are made from quality material and designed to provide years of outstanding service.

By using any of the Hornady shellplates changing calibers can be done easily when using the Lock-N-Load Press. However the shellplate also works on the older model of the Projector Press. Simply choose the product according to caliber and the reloading sessions can begin.

products.name: Hornady Pacific Die Wrench for Custom Grade Die Flats
products.description: Fits the flats of the Custom Grade™ dies spindle assembly lock rings and die body.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Deluxe Die Wrench
products.description:
Hornady® Lock-N-Load® Deluxe Die Wrench makes the perfect hassle-saving 4-in-1 tool for use with your Lock-N-Load AP or single-stage Classic press. It firmly holds shell plates and prevents rotation for effortlessly changing plates and tightening press screws. Use the Lock-N-Load Deluxe Die Wrench to quickly and easily adjust the tightness of the spindle lock lock rings and die flats.

  • This is a 4-in-1 tool designed for use with the Hornady Lock-N-Load AP and single-stage Classic presses. 
  • It is used to hold the shell plate to prevent it from rotating adjust the tightness of the spindle lock and lock rings and tighten or loosen die flats. 
  • The wrench is red and made of metal.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Deluxe Die Locking Ring Wrench
products.description:
The Hornady Lock-N-Load Deluxe Die Locking Ring Wrench is just the tool you need to complement your Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Press as well as any set of Hornady dies. This wrench was specifically constructed to hold your shellplates in place to keep them from slipping while you adjust the plate as well as secure it to your AP press.

Not only is the Hornady Lock-N-Load Deluxe Die Locking Ring Wrench made from high-quality materials to ensure maximum durability but it features three flats for use in tightening spindle locks and lock rings as well as dies.

products.name: Hornady ELD Match Seating Stem .22 cal .224" 75/80 gr
products.description: The Hornady ELD Match seating stems are designed to fit Hornady Custom Grade Dies and are machined to fit the profile of the A-MAX and FTX bullets to seat them as precisely as possible without damaging bullets. (Not compatible with other manufacturers? dies.)

products.name: Hornady ELD Match Seating Stem .25 cal .257" 134gr

products.name: LOCK-N-LOAD PRIMER TUBE KIT SMALL 3PK
products.description:
The Hornady Lock-N-Load Primer Tube Kit comes in small and large primer pickup tubes. For serious reloaders this is a convenient replacement item to keep on hand. As with all Hornady products everything in this kit is carefully engineered and must pass strict company and industry quality control checks. In addition the company provides a solid guarantee on everything manufactured and sold.

Included with this primer tube kit is the primer pickup and one cotter pin which together measure approximately 14 inches in length. The tube is made from aluminum that keeps the cost down

products.name: Hornady Lock-n-Load Attachment Adapter
products.description: Use the Hornady Lock-n-Load attachment adapter with your power drill for your case prep needs. (Power drill shown not included)

products.name: Hornady Universal Accessory Bin & Bracket for LOCK-N-LOAD and CLASSIC Presses
products.description: he swiveling base of the Hornady Universal Accessory cartridge bin bracket allows for adaptability on the Lock-N-Load AP? and Classic? Presses. Use it to conveniently store finished rounds.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Cartridge Catcher
products.description:
The Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Cartridge Catcher may be simple and inexpensive but for reloading sessions it makes a huge difference in the overall process. For high-volume reloading this catcher is ideal. When it comes time to upgrade a press that is capable of catching a greater number of loaded rounds prior to emptying the standard unit the catcher is proven to boost productivity.

The catcher is like having an extra set of hands. Made to fit the Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Progressive Press the large catcher is designed to collect up to one-third more loaded cartridges than a standard catcher.

products.name: Hornady Die Box - Large (Dies Shown Not Included)
products.description:
Every Hornady® Custom Grade™ and Match Grade™ die set comes in a convenient box that’s compartmentalized for dies bushings shell holders and a taper crimp die.

Stackable and clearly labeled they offer an organized and clean approach to storing your dies and can be purchased separately.

Dies shown not included.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load AP Tool Caddy
products.description: Improve efficiency and convenience by storing frequently used tools directly on a Hornady Lock-N-Load AP press. Install bracket and caddy on either side of the press and rotate to the desired position for quick access and efficient organization. Includes three combination wrenches four hex wrenches needle nose pliers and a Hornady Deluxe Die Wrench.

products.name: Hornady Lock-N-Load Headspace Comparator BUSHINGS ONLY 5/ct
products.description:
The Lock?N?Load Headspace Comparator extends brass life improves accuracy and enhances safety. The gauge measures variations in brass before and after firing or re?sizing. It allows for headspace comparison between fire?formed brass and re?sized brass.

The five bushings that come with the Lock?N?Load Headspace Comparator provide the ability to check most bottleneck cases from .17 Rem through belted magnums. Ackley Improved chambers use the same bushing size as the parent case. See chart provided or consult product instructions for cartridge/bushing size details.

products.name: Wheeler Upper Receiver Action Rod AR-15
products.description: The new Upper Receiver AR-15 Action Rod is a must have tool when building any kind of AR-15. The tool eliminates stress on the upper receiver when installing a barrel and works on all AR-15 barrels with standard barrel extensions. The rod also works on both forged and milled upper receivers and the design enables you to work on the upper with no need to remove your sights or optics. A simple twist and lock design makes it easy to hold the tool in place when working and a gas port index rod is included in the design.

products.description:
The M&P AR-15 Rifle Customizable Lower Parts Kit is the perfect choice if you want to build a custom AR-15. This kit provides all the minor parts generally used in an AR-15 build but allows the flexibility to add popular common aftermarket upgrades.

products.name: Frankford Universal Bullet Seating Die
products.description:
The Universal Bullet Seating Die works with .224 to .338 caliber bullets. Featuring a cutout window die body the Universal Bullet Seating Die holds the bullet in place while seating. The built-in micrometer allows for precise .001” micro-adjustments to the seating depth of the bullet. Includes 9 bullet alignment sleeves 3 VLD bullet seating stems and a molded storage case. (Note: one alignment sleeve and one VLD bullet seating stem are pre-assembled inside the die.)

Included Caliber Fittings

  • .224 Cal
  • .243 Cal
  • .257 Cal
  • .264 Cal
  • .277 Cal
  • .284 Cal
  • .308 Cal
  • .325 Cal
  • .338 Cal

Features

  • Experience precise micro-adjustments to the seater depth of the bullet with a built-in micrometer
  • Works for .224 - .338 cal and has a standard 7/8 x 14 thread
  • One alignment sleeve and VLD bullet seating stem are preassembled in the die
  • Bullet alignment sleeves 3 CLD bullet seating stems and a molded storage case

products.name: Frankford Arsenal FX-10 Replacement Tool Head for FX-10 Progressive Press
products.description:
Compatible with the FX-10 Progressive Press this replacment tool head allows for quick and easy swapping between calibers & reloading operations. This tool head will eliminate the headache of swapping and setting dies keeping you behind the press reloading precise ammunition.

FEATURES

  • 10 STATION PRESS
  • STANDARD 7/8X14” DIES

products.name: Frankford Arsenal Powder Measure Progressive Press
products.description:
The Frankford Arsenal Case Activated Powder Measure is compatible with our X-10 Progressive Reloading Press and features sturdy aluminum construction a unique hopper to prevent powder bridging micrometer adjustable powder dispensing and ultra smooth ball bearing operation. Included with the powder measure is the required linkage for plug-and-play operation with the X-10 Progressive Press.

FEATURES:

  • Compatible With Frankford Progressive Press
  • Includes Measure And Required Linkage For Operation
  • Static Free Aluminum Body
  • Unique Hopper Shape Prevents Powder Bridging
  • Micrometer Adjustable Powder Dispensing
  • Powder Drum Rides In Ball Bearings For Smooth Operation

products.name: Frankford Arsenal X-10 Rifle Bullet Collator
products.description: Experience a new level of reloading convenience with the X-10 Rifle Bullet Collator. When combined with an X-10 Rifle Bullet Feed Caliber Conversion Kit (available separately) this system allows you to feed and seat bullets in the same station freeing up a station for bullet crimp or other operations. Ultimately this provides the user with more precise and accurate reloads. The collator mounts directly to the X-10 and the power stems from the X-10 Case Feeder to reduce clutter. Capable of holding up to 300 bullets at a time the X-10 Rifle Bullet Collator features an automatic shut-off and is compatible with .223 .243/6mm .264/6.5mm and .308 caliber bullets. Elevate your X-10 reloading experience today and let the X-10 Rifle Bullet Feed System redefine your bullet feeding standards?

products.name: Frankford Arsenal X-10 9mm Bullet Feed Conversion Kit
products.description:
Caliber conversion kits include everything needed to connect the X-10 Bullet Feeder Collator (sold separately) to the X-10 Progressive Reloading Press. Kits include a caliber-specific bullet collator plate bullet feed and shuttle assembly and a micrometer adjustable seating die. The bullet feed system is integrated seamlessly into the X-10 Tool Head to feed and seat bullets in the same station.

Features:

  • Kit includes bullet feed die assembly and bullet feed plate
  • Integrates seamlessly into the x-10 tool head
  • Feeds and seats bullets in the same station
  • Micrometer for adjustable seating depth (0.001") for fine-tuning bullet seating

products.name: Frankford Arsenal Swage Support Die
products.description:
The Swage Support Die is compatible with the Frankford Arsenal X-10 Progressive Press along with any other reloading system utilizing inline swaging. If running multiple X-10 Tool Heads the user can leave this die fully setup on their Tool Head making it quick and easy to make caliber swaps.

Features:

  • For use with x-10 progressive press or other reloading systems that utilize inline swaging
  • Standard 7/8"X14 threads
  • Leave installed on x-10 tool head for fast caliber swaps

products.name: Frankford Arsenal X-10 Powder Measure Relocation Kit
products.description:
The X-10 Powder Measure Relocation Kit adds even more versatility to the X-10 Progressive Press by relocating the powder drop operation to the station immediately after priming (station six). This allows the user to add powder check bullet feed bullet seat bullet crimp or other die setup configurations after powder drop.

  • Allows Powder Drop To Take Place In Station Six Freeing Up Space For Other Operations After Powder.
  • Relocating To Station Six Does Not Sacrifice The Positive Reset Feature On The Powder Measure.
  • Allows The Ability To Run Additional Dies Like Powder Check Bullet Crimp And Other Dies There Would Not Have Been Space For Before.

products.name: Frankford Arsenal X-10 Index Assembly
products.description: An extra X-10 Index Assembly is a great spare part to have on hand to eliminate downtime in case the factory-installed assembly wears.

products.name: Frankford Arsenal X-10 Small Primer Tube Kit 3/ct
products.description:
Coming in a convenient 3-pack this kit allows for 300 additional primers to be loaded up ahead of a reloading session and ultimately improves overall round output. The X-10 Primer Tube Kits can work with any progressive press on the market.

  • 100 Primer Capacity Per Tube Allows The Ability To Pre-load An Extra 300 Primers Ahead Of A Loading Session.
  • Primer Tube Kits Are Available For Both Small And Large Primers.

products.name: Frankford Arsenal X-10 Spare Locator Buttons Small 8/ct
products.description: The X-10 Spare Locator Buttons are small but crucial parts of the X-10 that can be easily lost or misplaced. Having an extra set on hand prevents downtime and provides peace of mind should the originals that came with the unit get misplaced.

products.name: Frankford Arsenal Small Swage-Prime Pin Assembly
products.description: The X-10 Small Swage-Prime Pin Assembly contains a small swage and prime pin which are crucial parts of the X-10. Having an extra set on hand prevents downtime and provides peace of mind should the factory-installed units wear or get damaged.

products.name: Frankford Arsenal Dielocker Die Lock Rings with Wrench 3/ct
products.description:
A must-have addition to your die set the Frankford Arsenal Dielocker Lock Rings are designed for precision engineered for convenience and built to elevate your reloading experience. This innovative lock ring set redefines the way you fine-tune your dies. Crafted from anodized aluminum these split-ring designed lock rings offer both durability and superior maneuverability. The slim and sleek design of both the lock rings and included wrench fit effortlessly between tight spaces commonly found on progressive and turret presses. Featuring graduation marks at every .001" these lock rings allow for minute die adjustments with exceptional precision. Whether you're reloading pistol or rifle cartridges our lock rings seamlessly integrate into your existing setup. Frankford Arsenal Dielocker Lock Rings are compatible with all standard 7/8"x14 dies.

  • Anodized Aluminum lock ring construction provides maximum durability and ensure the rings last a lifetime
  • The slim lock ring wrench and lock rings are designed to easily make adjustments in tight spaces – a common occurrence on progressive and turret presses
  • Reference marks (every .001”) on lock rings allow for finite adjustments of reloading dies ensuring unmatched precision
  • Split-ring design provides exceptional locking force while protecting die threads
  • Compatible with standard 7/8"-14 dies for use with almost any press and die combination

products.name: Frankford Arsenal X-10 Replacement P-Clips and Screws Black
products.description: The P-clip on the X-10 Tool Head is fragile and can break easily when changing out dies or doing a caliber conversion. Having an extra set on hand prevents downtime and provides peace of mind should the factory-installed unit break or become damaged.

products.name: Frankford Arsenal X-10 Large Swage-Prime Pin Assembly
products.description: The X-10 Large Swage-Prime Pin Assembly contains a large swage and prime pin which are crucial parts of the X-10. Having an extra set on hand prevents downtime and provides peace of mind should the factory-installed units wear or get damaged.

products.name: Frankford Arsenal Precision Turret Press Spare Turret
products.description: Maximize your reloading efficiency with the Frankford arsenal precision turret press spare turret in gray engineered for reloaders who value speed consistency and ease of use. Designed to work seamlessly with the Frankford arsenal precision turret press this spare turret allows you to keep multiple die setups pre-installed reducing downtime and enabling quick caliber changes. Manufactured from durable long-lasting materials that uphold Frankford Arsenal's reputation for precision and reliability this turret is built to handle repetitive reloading cycles without compromising performance.

products.name: Wheeler AR Armorer's Ultra Kit
products.description:
The Wheeler Delta Series AR-15 Armorers Kit ULTRA contains every tool a gunsmith or armorer needs to complete a full rifle build make repairs or perform maintenance on AR-15/M16 platform rifles. This kit can perform over 50 different operations and functions of AR-15 building and maintenance. Delta Series tools are designed with specific features to perform functions with precision and ease. Each tool is constructed of the highest quality materials to deliver the best performance at a great value. The Wheeler Delta Series AR-15 Armorers Kit ULTRA is the most comprehensive AR-15 build and maintain kit on the market.

  • AR Armorers Vise
  • AR-15 Combo Tool
  • Torque Wrench
  • AR-15 Armorer?s Bench Block

  • Upper Vise Block Clamp with

products.name: Aero Precision Fixed Competition Chassis 17" Black
products.description:
The Solus Competition Chassis was designed to create the most precise and repeatable rifle to body connection. Modularity is another critical component of the Solus chassis a high focus on general ergonomics and adjustability ensures chassis fitment goes smoothly. Integrating industry-standard attachments like M-LOK and Arcra Swiss allows a true custom experience no matter the intended use.
 

Features:

  • Remington 700 short action footprint
  • V-Block bedding surfaces to ensure consistent lockup among different manufacture actions.
  • Compatibility with AICS and AIAIW detachable box magazines
  • Ambidextrous magazine catch
  • Adjustable magazine catch (to accommodate for variances in magazine tolerances)
  • Adjustable thumb rest
  • Compatible with tangless AR15 pistol grips.
  • Machined from custom 7075-T6 aluminum forgings.
  • Arca and M-LOK compatible forend with M-LOK slots at the 36 and 9 o'clock positions
  • 6 QD sling sockets
  • Compatible with Aero Precision's optional night vision bridge and bipod spigot
  • Can accommodate up to 1.25" barrel diameters
  • 7-position adjustable length of pull
  • Variable position adjustable cheek comb
  • Adjustable cant recoil pad
  • 5 QD sling sockets
  • Included bag rider

products.name: Rival Arms Firing Pin for GLOCK 9/40 GEN3/4 Twist Black
products.description:
If you shoot a lot sooner or later you will have a problem with a stock firing pin. Precision strikers improve performance and service life; a billet stainless steel striker with a self-lubricating coating resists wear and corrosion hit after hit. Precision stainless steel striker (firing pin) for Glock 9mm and .40 S&W models (excuding G43/43X/G48)

  • Tighter tolerances than factory
  • Low-temperature vacuum PVD (Physical Vapor Deposition) coating creates a durable barrier against wear and tear
  • CNC-machined from solid 17-4 PH stainless steel billet
  • Individually hand inspected for accuracy
  • No gunsmith required
  • Limited lifetime warranty

products.name: Rival Arms Guide Rod for Glock Model 17/22/34/35 GEN3 Stainless Steel
products.description:
Experienced shooters realize plastic guide rods can chip crack or break resulting in feeding or ejection failures flex can also contribute to accuracy problems. Rival Arms Guide Rod Assemblies address all of these issues and will provide you a lifetime of reliable service.

  • Premium spring (stock weight)
  • Fully assembled
  • The rod is CNC-machined from a solid stainless steel billet for a stronger more corrosion-resistant part
  • No gunsmith required
  • Limited lifetime warranty

products.name: WOOX Wild Man Stock for Savage Model 110 Long Action - Walnut
products.description:
It takes a traditional style integrated with groundbreaking technology with a classic look and feel to offer today's outdoors enthusiasts a solid rifle stock to rely on. The Wild Man is designed to be the lightest hunting aluminum chassis in the world. The WOOX Wild Man rifle stock is an aftermarket replacement stock that is suitable for several different OEM rifle stocks from some of the largest manufacturers.

Woox Savage stocks are inlet for Savage Factory DBM Bottom metal

Features:

  • TYPE HAND: Right-handed
  • COLOR OPTIONS: Walnut
  • SIZES: 30.5? or 77.5 cm
  • OAL: 30 " or 77.5 cm
  • LOP min: 12? 15/16 or 32.9 cm
  • LOP max: 13? 15/16 or 35.5 cm
  • WEIGHT: 3.2 lbs or 1.47 kg
  • BIGGEST FLOATING BARREL: 1.25" or 3.175 cm

products.name: WOOX Exactus Precision Stock for Remington 700 LA Walnut BLEM- NO DBM
products.description: Accuracy at a thousand yards is art and transferring the intentions of a shooter to a bullet destined for that distance requires an exacting platform. That’s why WOOX made the Exactus.Based on a forged aluminum monoblock chassis with precision-cut contact points of American walnut the Exactus is a professional tactical stock. Proudly made in Italy and USA.

products.name: WOOX Gladiatore Stock and Forend Kit for Mossberg 500 6.75" Action Tube Walnut
products.description:
Recognizing a lack of options for shotgun owners desiring upgrades that deliver a level of sophistication while also enhancing performance WOOX introduces the GLADIATORE Stock and Fore End Kit for Mossberg M88/M500/M590 and Remington 870 & Tac14 12 ga pump shotguns.

Genuine American Walnut with aggressive checkering for a sure grip coupled with a QD sling attachment point on the stock and M-LOK rails on the fore end for accessorizing. The Fore End features flared front and rear ends for confident operation. BONUS Fore End Removal Wrench is included for easy installation.

Stock Features: 

  • High grade American Walnut
  • Stock: 12.25” L x 1.5” W x 5” H (without spacers)
  • Min LOP: 13.75"
  • Max LOP: 14.75" (with 4 spacers)
  • QD attachment point
  • Water resistant coating
  • Ambidextrous
  • Checkered grip
  • Microcell pad for exceptional comfort
  • Spacers Included for LOP adjustment
  • Raised cheek comb
  • Simple to install (mounting hardware included)

Forend Features:

  • Forend: 8.75” L x 2.25”W x 2”H
  • High grade American Walnut
  • M-LOK rails for accessorizing
  • Flared ends enhance control
  • Ambidextrous
  • Water resistant coating
  • Simple to install (mounting hardware included)
  • Fits 12g and 20ga tubes (NOT .410ga)
  • Shotgun Fore End Removal Wrench included

products.name: Redding E-Z Feed Shell Holder - #1 Size
products.description:
The Redding E-Z Feed Shell Holders are unique because they feature a tapered design that makes case insertion easier than ever. Additionally these shell holders are precision-machined to very close tolerances to ensure a perfect fit for your cases and to eliminate any potential problems.

Not only are Redding E-Z Feed Shell Holders available in a variety of sizes but the universal design of the shell holder itself ensures that it fits all of the most popular reloading presses. These shell holders are also heat-treated and made with outside knurling so they are both easy to handle and easy to change.

The Redding E-Z Feed Shell Holders are unique because they feature a tapered design that makes case insertion easier than ever. Additionally these shell holders are precision-machined to very close tolerances to ensure a perfect fit for your cases and to eliminate any potential problems.

Not only are Redding E-Z Feed Shell Holders available in a variety of sizes but the universal design of the shell holder itself ensures that it fits all of the most popular reloading presses. These shell holders are also heat-treated and made with outside knurling so they are both easy to handle and easy to change.

products.name: Redding Competition Shell Holder Set - #1 Size
products.description:
The Redding Competition Shell HolderSet gives you the ability to have complete control over headspace and each set comes with five Redding Competition shell holders. These shell holders are sized in 0.002-inch increments and each one is clearly marked to tell you the amount by which it will decrease case-to-chamber headspace.

The Redding Competition Shell Holder Set comes in a heavy-duty plastic storage box to keep your shell holders in one place when they are not in use. This ensures that you can find your shell holders when you need them.

The Redding Competition Shell Holder Set #1 is designed for precision reloading. Tailored for seamless operation this set caters to avid reloaders who demand accuracy and consistency. The set includes various sizes ensuring compatibility and optimal performance for a range of calibers.


Master your headspace control with the Redding Competition Shell Holder Set. Precision is just a click away - buy yours now!

products.name: Redding E-Z Feed Shell Holder Set
products.description:
The Redding E-Z Feed Shell Holder Set comes with six of the most popular shell holder sizes that feature the Redding E-Z Feed design. The shell holders included in this set are as follows: #1 #10 #6 #12 #18 and #19.

The Redding E-Z Feed Shell Holder Set comes in a heavy-duty plastic storage box to keep your shell holders in one place when they are not in use. This ensures that you will be able to find your shell holders when you need them. These shell holders feature a unique tapered design to make case insertion easier.

products.name: Redding Instant Indicator Headspace and Bullet Comparator Without Dial Indicator 6.5 PRC
products.description:
The Redding Instant Indicator Headspace and Bullet Comparator is a precision tool used by reloaders to measure headspace and bullet seating depth to the lands. It comes in two versions:

With Dial Indicator :

  • Includes a precision dial indicator (usually 0.001" increments).

  • Ready to use out of the box.

  • Allows you to read measurements immediately—ideal for reloaders who don't already have a compatible dial indicator.

  • Typically slightly more expensive due to the included dial.

Without Dial Indicator :

  • Does not include the dial indicator - only the base tool insert(s) and stem(s).

  • You must supply your own dial indicator (must be compatible - typically a 0.375" stem diameter).

  • More cost-effective if you already own a dial indicator.
products.category: Die Parts Shell Holders & Accessories|Powder Measures Dispensers & Scales

products.name: Redding Stuck Case Removal Kit
products.description: Sooner or later everyone does it. Too little case lubricant (or using ordinary oil) and the case seizes in the resizing die. Usually the rim pulls off and it is almost impossible to remove the stuck case without damaging the die. This case removal kit provides an easy solution to your problems. Instructions included.

products.name: Redding Instant Indicator Headspace and Bullet Comparator With Dial Indicator 6.5 PRC
products.description:
The Redding 6.5 PRC Instant Indicator with Dial Indicator is a precision tool used by reloaders to measure critical dimensions of reloaded cartridges with consistency and accuracy. After resizing your brass you can quickly drop a case into the Instant Indicator to check shoulder setback (e.g. you want to bump the shoulder back by 0.002" for optimal chamber fit). You can also use it after bullet seating to ensure OAL consistency for tight groups.

The Redding Instant Indicator is a benchrest-quality measurement tool designed specifically for the 6.5 PRC cartridge. It comes pre-set with:

  • A dial indicator already installed.

  • A precision gauge body designed to hold your cartridge case.

  • A 6.5 PRC-specific insert to ensure exact compatibility with your brass. 

    What It Measures:

  1. Headspace from the datum line on the case shoulder (to check how much the shoulder is bumped back after resizing).

  2. Case length to the shoulder (to track brass growth and when trimming is needed).

  3. Base-to-ogive bullet seating depth (optional with additional bullet comparator insert).

  4. Cartridge overall length (OAL) consistency.

  5. Why Reloaders Use It:

  • Ensures safe and consistent resizing - especially important for long-range shooters using 6.5 PRC.

  • Helps fine-tune shoulder bump to match chamber dimensions.

  • Allows repeatable bullet seating for accuracy.

  • Great for batch sorting brass by shoulder position or bullet seating depth.

Included in the Box:

  • Instant Indicator tool body

  • Pre-mounted dial indicator (usually 0.001" resolution)

  • 6.5 PRC-specific case insert

  • Instructions
products.category: Die Parts Shell Holders & Accessories|Powder Measures Dispensers & Scales

products.name: Redding Big Boss Pro-Pack without Dies
products.description:
The Redding Big Boss Pro-Pack Without Dies comes with nearly everything you need to reload your magnum cartridges. The Redding Big Boss Single-Stage Reloading Press itself (included in this kit) is made with a heavy-duty cast-iron frame with a frame-and-ball handle that is offset for easy operation.

Also included in the Redding Big Boss Pro-Pack Without Dies are the model 2 powder scale a powder trickler a deburring tool a model 18 case prep kit a powder funnel and a reloading manual. The only thing you need to buy separately are your case preparation dies.

products.name: Redding Neck Sizing Buttons .6mm
products.description: Make inside neck sizing smoother and easier without lubrication. Now you can upgrade your die sets with a carbide size button kit. Available for bottleneck cartridges 20 thru 338 cal. The carbide size button is free floating on the decap rod allowing it to self-center in the case neck. Kit contains carbide size button retainer and spare decapping pin.

products.name: Redding Carbide Neck Sizing Button Kit 25 Cal
products.description: Make inside neck sizing smoother and easier without lubrication. Now you can upgrade your die sets with a carbide size button kit. Available for bottleneck cartridges 20 thru 338 cal. The carbide size button is free floating on the decap rod allowing it to self-center in the case neck. Kit contains carbide size button retainer and spare decapping pin.

products.name: Redding 7mm Carbide Size Button Kits
products.description: Make inside neck sizing smoother and easier without lubrication. Now you can upgrade your die sets with a carbide size button kit. Available for bottleneck cartridges 20 thru 338 cal. The carbide size button is free floating on the decap rod allowing it to self-center in the case neck. Kit contains carbide size button retainer and spare decapping pin.

products.name: Redding T-7 Extra Turret
products.description:
The Redding T-7 Extra Turret is a great item to have on hand if you frequently use your Redding T-7 Turret Press (Item RB67000). This tool features a 7-station turret head which can turned to set your next reloading die in place. The more turrets you have the more easily you can switch between different calibers.

If you are the type of reloader who uses multiple caliber sizes with your Redding T-7 Turret Press you may want to have a few extra turrets on hand. Simple load the die in the turret then when you are ready to switch calibers swap out the turret head. It is that simple.

products.name: Redding Turret Stacker
products.description: The Redding Turret Stacker is a convenient system for storing extra turret heads. Supplied with an assortment of spacers allowing up to three turrets to be stacked with dies installed thus preserving their adjustment. This system also prevents damage to decapping rods and pins when dies are not in use.

products.name: Redding Steel Neck Bushings .288"
products.description:
Redding Neck Bushings are available in various diameters and made for use with RCBS Gold Medal Match series dies. Because of variances in thickness for the neck brass the standard die sizes the neck under the preferred diameter. To get the proper tension on the bullet an expander ball is pulled.

In addition these bushings are self-centering and changeable which makes it possible to set the amount of tension on a bullet with precision. As a result there is less work on the brass helping prolong life while increasing accuracy.

products.name: Redding Neck Sizing Bushings .246"
products.description:
Redding Neck Sizing Bushings are sold in a wide range of diameters including .256 .261 .262 .288 .307 .309 .311 and others. Regardless of the diameter chosen all of the sizing bushings used for reloading are made of steel that has been heat treated and have a titanium nitride treatment to increase the effective surface hardness. This also helps reduce friction associated with sizing.

The bushings are made to cover calibers from .17 to .338 while providing the exact amount of neck tension needed to hold the bullet firmly in place but without causing excessive resizing.

The bushings are made to cover calibers from .17 to .338 while providing the exact amount of neck tension needed to hold the bullet firmly in place but without causing excessive resizing.

products.name: Redding Bushing Storage Box
products.description: The Redding Neck Sizer Die Bushing Storage box provides handy storage for up to 15 Neck Sizing Bushings in individual molded spaces. Material: Plastic Features: Hinged lid and snap-latch closure Notes: Holds up to 15 neck sizing bushings in individual molded spaces.

products.name: Redding Slide Bar Automatic Primer Feeding System
products.description: The Redding Slide bar Automatic Primer Feeding System is a great time saver during the reloading process. The time saving advantages of a progressive press can never be fully realized if brass is still primed by hand. With the Redding Slide Bar Automatic Primer Feeding System brass is primed quickly and easily while it is on the press. This automatic priming system from Redding fits the Big Boss Single Stage Press and Redding T-7 Turret reloading press and includes both large and small primer tubes and a safety shield.

products.name: RCBS Primer Catcher JR/RS/RC
products.description:
The RCBS Primer Catcher JR/RS/RC is a simple but effective device that was designed to keep your spent primers from falling to the floor. This primer catcher features a plastic lip that holds the primer catcher snugly against your reloading press to catch spent primers before they hit the floor.

The RCBS Primer Catcher JR/RS/RC may fit snug against your reloading press but it removes easily whenever you need to empty it. This primer catcher was specifically designed for use with JR Rock Chucker and Reloader Special reloading presses.

products.name: RCBS Stuck Case Remover Kit
products.description:
The RCBS Stuck Case Remover Kit is a tool that every serious reloader should have on hand. If a case gets stuck in your standard sizer die the RCBS Stuck Case Remover Kit is just what you need to quickly and easily remove the case without damaging your die.

In an easy two-step process the RCBS Stuck Case Remover Kit extracts stuck cases without doing any damage to your die. This kit includes the tap and drill bit as well as the Allen wrench Allen screw and remover tool. As an added bonus it is guaranteed to function with any brand of die.

products.name: RCBS Rock Chucker Supreme Auto Prime
products.description: The RCBS Rock Chucker Supreme Auto Prime will convert your one-at-a-time priming to a tube fed priming system and also eliminate the handling of primers. The RC Supreme Auto Prime body attaches to the same place as the standard priming arm.

products.name: RCBS Rock Chucker Supreme Auto Prime
products.description: The RCBS Rock Chucker Supreme Auto Prime will convert your one-at-a-time priming to a tube fed priming system and also eliminate the handling of primers. The RC Supreme Auto Prime body attaches to the same place as the standard priming arm.

products.name: RCBS Replacement Berdan Decapping Pin
products.description: This replacement steel pin is designed for use in the RCBS Military/Berdan decapping tool. It decaps 8mm Rimless 6.5mm Mannlicher-Schoenauer 11.7mm Rimmed and more.

products.name: RCBS Primer Plug and Sleeve Large
products.description:
The RCBS Primer Plug and Sleeve comes in a variety of different sizes for use with all of the most popular cartridge calibers. These replacement parts are made from high-quality materials to ensure that they deliver the same level of quality as the original.

These RCBS Primer Plugs and Sleeves are compatible with most c-frame type single-stage reloading presses as well as the RCBS Rock Chucker and the Reloader Special. If you are looking for a replacement primer plug and sleeve that works just like the original look no further than the RCBS Primer Plug and Sleeve.

products.name: RCBS Primer Plug and Sleeve Small
products.description:
The RCBS Primer Plug and Sleeve comes in a variety of different sizes for use with all of the most popular cartridge calibers. These replacement parts are made from high-quality materials to ensure that they deliver the same level of quality as the original.

These RCBS Primer Plugs and Sleeves are compatible with most c-frame type single-stage reloading presses as well as the RCBS Rock Chucker and the Reloader Special. If you are looking for a replacement primer plug and sleeve that works just like the original look no further than the RCBS Primer Plug and Sleeve.

products.name: RCBS Decapping Pins .50 BMG - 2/pk
products.description: Most 'Precision' Reloader Special X & Cowboy Sizer Dies require a 90164R headed decapping pin. One size fits all calibers. Order straight decapping pins for competition and older "Precision" sizer dies.

products.name: RCBS Small Decapping Pins - 5/ct
products.description:
While RCBS Small Decapping Pins - 5/count might not seem that important for reloading they are vital. By having extra pins on hand valuable time is never wasted. This replacement part fits various dies for different cartridges is made from strong and durable steel and is used as a replacement for lost or broken decapping pins.

Because RCBS offers various options it is important to determine the correct decapping pins needed. To accomplish this the broken pin is simply removed from the die and then examined to see if it has a straight or headed design.

products.name: RCBS Large Decapping Pins - 5/ct
products.description:
People involved with home reloading know all too well that sometimes parts break which is why having RCBS Large Decapping Pins - 5/count on hand is so convenient. Just like all the other parts sold by RCBS these decapping pins are made from high-quality steel and meet strict specifications.

These decapping pins are designed to fit RCBS Precision dies including for .35 Whelen .358 Winchester .356 Winchester 7mm Thompson/Center Ugalde and .416 Remington Magnum. As with all RCBS products the pins come with a solid guarantee to ensure complete customer satisfaction.

products.name: RCBS Short Decapping Unit
products.description:
The RCBS Short Decapping Unit is competitively priced high quality and provided with a lifetime guarantee. This particular reloading tool is made in the United States meets strict company standards for materials and workmanship and is durable enough to last a lifetime.

Although this decapping unit weighs just 1.6 ounces it is powerful. RCBS has been in the business of manufacturing equipment tools and accessories for reloaders for the past 60-plus years. To the company quality is imperative; as such only the finest available products are sold. With the right tools shooters enjoy far more accuracy.

products.name: RCBS Power Punch Decapping Assembly
products.description:
Rather than purchase reloading parts separately the RCBS Power Punch Decapping Assembly is a more economical option. Made for various calibers and diameters this decapping assembly boasts an extremely hard and slick expander button complete with a positioning sleeve for easy adjustment.

The button also makes extraction through the case neck easier which helps prevent problems of stretching but also reduces case trimming. As a result the case will have longer life and accuracy is enhanced. For self-centering in the case neck the assembly also includes the free-floating button design.

products.name: RCBS Die Lock Ring Wrench - 1-3/16
products.description:
The RCBS Die Lock Ring Wrench is a must-have tool for the serious reloader because it gives you an easy and efficient method for tightening the lock ring on your RCBS dies. This tool features a special pivoting handle that gives you increased leverage from horizontal up to 90-degree angles.

If you are looking for the perfect tool to facilitate tightening of the lock rings on your RCBS dies look no further than the RCBS Die Lock Ring Wrench. Like all RCBS products the RCBS Die Lock Ring Wrench is made from high-quality materials guaranteed to deliver a lifetime of durable performance.

products.name: RCBS Expander/Decapping Assembly .223 cal
products.description: The RCBS Expander/Decapping Assembly comes in a variety of different sizes to accommodate all of the most popular cartridge case calibers. This expander and decapping assembly features an ultra-hard carbide expander button which has an adjustable positioning sleeve

products.description: The RCBS Expander/Decapping Assembly comes in a variety of different sizes to accommodate all of the most popular cartridge case calibers. This expander and decapping assembly features an ultra-hard carbide expander button which has an adjustable positioning sleeve

products.name: RCBS Neck Expander Body
products.description:
For people who do reloading there are a number of different mechanisms required including the RCBS Neck Expander Body. Available for several different diameters this neck expander body is highly recommended when loading cast bullets for rifles in bottleneck cases.

The expander body has the ability to expand the neck of the case while also flaring the mouth slightly all in one easy step. For accurately seating bullets without shaving off lead and to ensure perfect bullet weight on both sides this is the ideal accessory. Expander plus are available but sold separately.

products.name: RCBS Neck Expander Plug Rod
products.description: This Expander Plug Rod is for use with the RCBS Neck Expander Die (sold separately) which flares the inside dimension of only the case neck to ensure perfect alignment of the bullet during seating.

products.name: RCBS Neck Expander Plug .264 cal
products.description:
The RCBS Neck Expander Plug is designed for various dimensions including .224 .227 .264 .308 .309 .310 .321 .323 and many others. Regardless of the specific dimension preferred the plug is a replacement part used with the RCBS Neck Expander Die.

The primary benefit of using this expander plug is that expansion of the neck and flaring of the case mouth can be completed in one easy step. For reloading cast bullets this is one of the most critical steps so it is vital to choose the best product available which is exactly what RCBS offers.

products.name: RCBS Die Locking Ring 7/8 x 14 Thread
products.description:
The RCBS Die Locking Ring is just what you need to quickly and easily set up your RCBS dies and to lock them in place so you never have to recalibrate the unit when you remove and replace the dies. This die locking ring was made from solid steel to ensure durability for many years to come.

If you are looking for a high-quality locking ring to keep your dies in place look no further than the RCBS Die Locking Ring. This die locking ring fits all standard 7/8-inch-14 threaded dies including standard RCBS models. With this RCBS Die Locking Ring you never have to recalibrate after replacing the die.

products.name: RCBS Decap Die .22-25 caliber
products.description:
The RCBS Decap Die .22-.25 Caliber is just the tool you need to quickly and efficiently remove primers from your cartridge cases to prepare them for cleaning. This tool was specially designed for light-duty depriming and decapping projects involving cases between .22 and .25 caliber.

Like all RCBS products the RCBS Decap Die .22-.25 Caliber was made from high-quality materials designed to deliver a lifetime of durable performance. This decapping die saves you a great deal of time and hassle because it allows you to use unclean and unlubricated cases.

products.name: RCBS Heavy Duty Depriming and Decapping Die Replacement Decapping Assembly - .27 thru 45 Caliber
products.description:
As the name implies the RCBS Heavy Duty Depriming and Decapping Die Replacement Decapping Assembly - .27 thru 45 Caliber is for specific calibers. With this ideal reloading accessory cases that have not been cleaned or lubricated are deprimed before being cleaned in a case cleaner.

On name alone consumers can feel confident in the construction of this die. Very quickly primers from cases are removed which saves time and prevents frustration. For avid shooters this die is made to work with the RCBS Heavy Duty Depriming and Decapping Die that ultimately improves accuracy.

products.name: RCBS Powder Checker
products.description:
The RCBS Powder Checker is just the tool you need to make a visual check of your powder charges when you are using an RCBS progressive press. Simply place this tool between your powder charging station and your bullet seating station where it will be easy to access and use.

The RCBS Powder Checker not only makes it easy to spot a

products.name: RCBS AmmoMaster .50 BMG Press Conversion Kit
products.description:
The RCBS AmmoMaster .50 BMG Press Conversion Kit was specifically designed for use with the RCBS AmmoMaster to convert it for use with .50 Browning Machine Gun (BMG) cartridge cases. If you are a serious reloader who prefers .50 BMG cases this press conversion kit is a must-have.

Included in the RCBS AmmoMaster .50 BMG Press Conversion Kit is everything you need to convert your standard AmmoMaster for use with .50 BMG cases. This kit includes all of the parts you need to adapt your press to the 1 _-inch die size for use with .50 BMG cases.

products.name: RCBS AmmoMaster .50 BMG Shell Holder
products.description:
The RCBS AmmoMaster .50 BMG Shell Holder is just what you need to hold your .50 Browning Machine Gun (BMG) cartridge cases in place for reloading. This shell holder is designed to be used with the RCBS AmmoMaster fitted to the top of the press where you would normally find a die on a standard reloading press.

Simply slide your .50 BMG cartridge case into the RCBS AmmoMaster .50 BMG Shell Holder at the top of your press then fit the press ram with your primer holder. When you move the ram upward the primer will be inserted into the case

products.name: RCBS Headed Decapping Pins - 5/ct
products.description:
As serious reloaders know parts sometimes break which is why having RCBS Headed Decapping Pins - 5/count on hand is so important. This replacement part is made from the same high-quality materials and workmanship found in other RCBS products and made to last.

Made from steel these decapping pins are designed for RCBS reloader special dies and RCBS Cowboy dies. In addition the pins work with all Precision dies excluding .356 Winchester 6mm PPC .357 Sig .358 Winchester 7mm TCU .35 Whelen and .416 Remington Magnum. The pins are sold in 50 count as well.

products.name: RCBS Trim Pro-2 Power Case Trimmer with Spring Loaded Shell Holder
products.description:
The RCBS Trim Pro-2 Power Case Trimmer has the same improved spring-loaded universal shell holder as the manual trimmer but with a high-torque low-RPM motor. The self-feeding spring-fed cutter makes case trimming easy and accurate. No pushing or feeding pressure is required leaving hands free to do other case preparation tasks such as chamfering deburring or primer pocket cleaning. The positive locking handle and integral power switch makes operation simple and safe. Note: Cases with rim diameters larger than .625-inch must be trimmed on the 90352 High Capacity Trimmer.

  • Manual on/off switch aids in setting case trim length
  • Kit includes pilots: .22 .24 .25 .27 .28 .30 .35 .44 and .45

products.name: RCBS Short Handle for Summit Press
products.description: This short handle replaces the long handle that comes standard on the Summit Single-Stage Reloading Press.

products.name: RCBS Accessory Handle 2 For RCBS 9577/9578
products.description: This large ergonomic handle can be used with a wide array of RCBS accessories.

products.name: RCBS Stuck Case Remover 2 Kit
products.description: The Stuck Case Remover—2 Kit lets reloaders extract cases from dies with removable guide bushings. It's also useful for the RCBS® Competition Dies or other sizer dies with a raised expander ball. Kit contains two extractor nuts and two punch rods.

products.name: RCBS - Shell Holder Rack
products.description:
With the RCBS - Shell Holder Rack the long and tedious process of sorting through loose shellholders is eliminated. As a result finding the exact holder needed is much easier. This rack helps keep shells organized and can accommodate as many as 24 shell holders and as a bonus six Trim Pro trimmer shell holders.

Included in the low price is a cover that keeps both dirt and dust out. This rack can be attached to a pegboard or reloading bench or if preferred mounted to the wall. This holder rack is made from quality materials and is guaranteed to last. Rack only. Contents sold separately.

products.description:
Ram-Line stocks withstand the test of time adding strength accuracy and dependability to your rifle or shotgun. Whether you’re a seasoned hunter or beginning shooter Ram-Line has a stock for you. Ram-Line’s replacement stocks are available for a variety of firearms and in multiple finishes. Ram-Line one piece stocks are made of tough glass-filled polycarbonate that won’t warp like wood stocks.

Introducing Ram-Line’s Wild Web Pattern. Ideal for blending into western vegetation this new pattern helps hunters hide in plain sight. Lightweight and with superior gripping ability Wild Web is the ultimate concealment stock.

products.name: LimbSaver Precision Fit Recoil Pad for Ruger M-77 Wood/Synthetic Stock
products.description: The LimbSaver Precision-Fit Recoil Pad is a custom fit recoil reduction pad for rifles and shotguns that is easily installed after removal of the existing stock pad. It features our innovative recoil reduction technology that absorbs shock and vibration. This revolutionary three-step process features Sims Vibration Laboratory’s proprietary NAVCOM (Noise and Vibration Control Material). It is designed to displace shock on a broadband spectrum (0 to 2500 Hz) ensuring maximum shock relief from recoil and greater protection for the shooter. This superior LimbSaver recoil reduction system allows greater access to the firearms sport for women youth and the disabled.

products.name: LimbSaver AR-15/M4 Snap-On Recoil Pad Black
products.description:
This recoil pad is designed to snap securely onto most six-position adjustable stocks and it's been proven to reduce felt recoil by up to 60% while minimizing muzzle jump. The result? Faster recovery time greater accuracy and maximum stability for follow-up shots.

One of the standout features of the LimbSaver AR-15/M4 Snap-On Recoil Pad is its air chamber technology. This innovative design effectively absorbs recoil away from your body significantly reducing fatigue and making shooting more comfortable – even over extended sessions.

But what really sets this recoil pad apart is its ease of use. The snap-on design allows you to easily attach and detach the pad from your stock so you can customize your shooting experience with ease. And because it's made by LimbSaver – a trusted brand with a proven track record of innovation and performance – you can trust that you're getting a high-quality accessory that will last.

  • Snaps onto most six-position adjustable stocks
  • Reduced felt recoil by up to 60%
  • Reduces muzzle jump allowing for faster target re-acquisition
  • Helps keep rifle securely positioned against your shoulder
  • Built to be used outdoors in all harsh environments

products.name: Limbsaver Airtech Slip-On Pad Small /Medium Black 1/2" LOP
products.description:
The world’s most advanced recoil pad is now available as a slip-on option for most rifles shotguns and muzzleloaders. It features advanced atmospheric chambers which produce a substantial increase in performance through uniform energy dissipation. No installation necessary just slip over the end of your firearm stock and feel the difference immediately.

AirTech Slip-On pads are designed to slip over existing firearm stocks without any modifications. Though slip-on pads will work with or without factory recoil pads we highly recommend removing the existing pad before putting the slip-on recoil pad on; this will ensure the best fit and will prevent slipping during use.

Small/Medium: 1/2" LOP 4-5/8" x 1-9/16" up to 5-1/8" x 1-3/4"

products.description:
LimbSaver’s AirTech line features atmospheric chambers that produce a substantial increase in performance through uniform energy dissipation and it incorporates anti-muzzle jump technology for faster target re-acquisition. The recoil pad enables you to shoot longer without discomfort and bruising while also helping to increase accuracy of follow-up shots and provide improved control for maximum stability. This recoil pad also features a no-slip surface that stays in place even in the rain. Some model variations may require the use of an additional adapter.
